"Gotcha!" Becca nodded, walking away from Liz and making her way into the back, where Luke wasn't exactly working hard.

"Are you afraid of that sweeping brush?" Becca smirked.

"No." Luke responded, turning to see who it was Liz had sent to help him. "Sweeping is a woman's work." He then chuckled.

"Really?" Becca arched an eyebrow, folding her arms.

"Yep. Just like cooking, and all other cleaning duties." Luke nodded, knowing his comments were sexist. He was joking of course, but Becca suspected that like most men, he actually believed there was some truth in what he said.

"Let's just get this dump tidied up, I don't want to be in here all day." Becca grumbled, shaking her head in annoyance. Being seperated from the outside only by a closed metal shutter, the Goods In area was always a little on the cold side. Becca decided to get working just to keep herself warm, but she was determined not to let Luke slack off and let her do everything.

And so the two of them got to work, while other co-workers came and went from the Goods In area.

After 20 minutes of work...
1111233.title: ...face to face with another co-worker.

11112332.content:
"Everything nearly tidied in here?" Liz asked, strutting into the Goods In area.

"Yep, no thanks to Luke." Becca responded, sneering at her co-worker, who hadn't exactly pulled his weight. Luke just shrugged his shoulders, not even attempting to defend himself. Not that he could, since he knew Becca had done most of the work.

"As long as it's done, I'm not bothered." Liz said sternly. "But you can pull your finger out Luke, otherwise you'll be in Elizabeth's office." she then said, glancing up into her employee's face.

Becca then decided to get Luke further into trouble. "You know he said cleaning is a woman's work." she muttered, eliciting a scowl from Luke. Both of them knew this would piss Liz off, since she depised sexism in all it's forms.

"Is that right?" Liz said, glaring at Luke.

"Yep." Becca nodded, slipping her hands in her jean pockets..

"Well maybe Luke should clean more often in that case." Liz said while looking at Luke.

"I agree." Becca smirked.
11112332.title: ...Liz came to check on them.

11113.content:
How about one of the senior Day Team members? Someone who is subordinate to Elizabeth but equal in position to Liz. One of those staff members is 43-year old Donna, cropped, shoulder-length black hair, 5' 6" tall, C-cup breasts, a mother of two teenage children. Her position in store is the supervisor of the Morning team.

Should this woman acquire the powers?
11113.title: Someone else?

111131.content: What powers does Donna get? The ability to swap people's bodies?
111131.title: Yes, why not.

1111312.content: Okay, how about the power to switch people's heads around?
1111312.title: No, something else.

11113121.content:
It was 8:30am on a Thursday morning and Donna was waiting outside the store waiting for her co-workers to arrive. She was swigging from a bottle of fruit-flavored water and observing the passersby as she waited. Today was the day that she and three other Wilkinson staff were heading off to another store to see how their new warehouse system worked. The store in question was 47 miles away, and it would take between 1 and 2 hours to get there by car.

Fortunately Liz had volunteered to drive them there, and she was one of the staff members assigned to go anyway. Donna leaned against a wall and kept glancing up and down the street, keeping an eye out for Liz's familiar, little red car. Donna was casually dressed in a black t-shirt, a denim jacket, a pair of dark jeans and a pair of white and beige sneakers. The slight crows feet under her eyes gave away Donna's mature age.

Suddenly Donna saw a large, five-seater vehicle pulled up next to the store, and out jumped Liz. "Morning Donna!" she beamed. "Lovely day huh?"

"About time we had some nice weather" Donna smiled back. She then studied her younger, 31-year old co-worker. Liz for once had her hair down, and it looked elegant with its blonde highlights and the single hair clip holding some of it in place. She was wearing a loose-fitting, dark grey knitted top with a hood and the sleeves rolled up, a pair of low-rise jeans and a pair of dark grey sneaker flats. Donna's face twisted slightly in jealously as she observed Liz, even though her prominent breasts were completely hidden from view by her top.

"Steven and Aaron here yet??" Liz then asked, as she reached into the back of her car for her own bottle of water.

"No not yet" Donna mumbled, shaking her head.

Liz took a drink from her bottle, then looked up in the sky, shielding her eyes from the sun. "Well we couldn't have picked a nicer day for this trip" she commented. "It was pissing it down with rain the last time I went to another store" she chuckled.

"Normal British weather" Donna told her, smirking.

As the two women were chatting, Steven walked up behind and surprised them. "Boo!" he said, prodding Liz in her side. Steven hadn't made that much of an effort in terms of his outfit for the day, he was just glad they didn't have to wear their work uniforms. He was wearing a black 'SSV Normandy' t-shirt (Mass Effect), a pair of plain black trousers and the black & grey, steel toe-capped boots he normally wore for work.

"Morning Steven!" Donna greeted him, as Liz just returned his poke...directing it into his chest. "To you too!" Liz laughed.

"You seen Aaron on your travels?" Donna then inquired of him.

No sooner had she asked that, Aaron made his appearance, wearing black trousers similar to Steven's, black loafers and a yellow t-shirt with a generic logo emblazened on the front. His short dark hair was treated with gel as always, in contrast to Steven's closely-shaved head. "I'm here!" Aaron grunted, being his usual laid-back self.

"Right, we all set?" Liz asked, gesturing to the car. "I've never driven this thing before today, my hubby is trusting me with his new car" she chuckled nervously. "So NOBODY distract me while we're on the road" she warned the others with a smile.

And with that, they all clambered inside the vehicle.
11113121.title: YES!!

111132.content: How about Becca, 23, one of the youngest workers in the store. She loves to talk, but most people avoid her or don't take her seriously because she's so young. Becca suddenly gains the power to make people fall in love. For example she can make two people fall in love with each other, or she can make people fall in love with certain body parts like her feet. She can even make someone fall in love with items within the store. (Example make Steven love a dress or paper plates) Whatever definition of love you want.
111132.title: No, somebody else please.

choices: One of her co-workers, maybe Steven?
1111321.content:
Becca was busy stocking returned items when it hit her, it felt like someone had punched her in the chest. She was suddenly hit with the power and knowledge that she can make people fall in love with anyone or anything she wants.

Becca felt the need to test out her new powers, as she was not entirely convinced they would work. She made her way to the dairy section where she found a woman checking expiration dates on the milk. Becca concentrated on the woman, she thought about making her really love milk. A few seconds later the women started to fill her cart with gallon after gallon of milk not even caring about expiration dates anymore.

Becca filled with joy, her powers had worked, she concentrated on the woman again and made it so that she loves to take baths in milk.

Now that she knew her powers worked, it was time to have a little fun, but who should she try them on next?
1111321.title: I love this idea!

choices: Laura gets a task off Liz.
She wanders the store a little.
1111322.content:
The red-headed 18-year old was panting, obviously out of breath when she arrived at work on Monday afternoon. She'd ran from the bus station to the store to avoid being late for the first time ever. Though to be fair, she had a perfectly good reason for being late, but it wasn't one that anyone would believe. While messing around at a friend's house with a book of 'magic', Laura became the recipient of a certain power. That power was the ability to swap people's traits, either physical or mental ones. She's discovered her ability by accidentally swapping breast size with her friend, Melissa, and to her amazement... Melissa didn't even notice her C-cups shrinking to Laura's B-cup size. She swapped them back of course, and then her head was filled with all the knowledge about her power. So... it had been a very itneresting day so far. And now, Laura had arrived at Wilko for her six hour shift, 3:00pm - 9:00pm along with every other employee.

"Cutting it fine aren't you luv?" Liz addressed an out of breath Laura as she almost 'fell' in the front doors.

"Er... yeah, uh... sorry Liz." Laura gasped, waving her hand in front of her face as she tried to get her breath back a little. She wondered why she didn't exercise more, then maybe she'd be in better shape physically.

"Well, you're not actually late, so why don't you run upstairs and put your things in your locker before you are." Liz said, glancing at her watch.

"Okay, be back down in a minute." Laura nodded, disappearing upstairs. Laura thought, like many others, that Liz was a little strict, but then again... she understood it came with being a supervisor. It was partly to impress Elizabeth of course, but Liz also did it for herself. She liked being a taskmaster, but she did try to be a fair one, unless she was in a bad mood, which was rare.

Laura slipped her coat and bag into her locker then turned around, immediately bumping into Charlotte... who had her trademark toothy grin on her face.

"You late?" Charlotte pried, hands on hips.

"No, nearly though." came Laura's response, sweat still visible on her brow.

"Well you don't want to spoil your perfect record do you, better run along to Liz." Charlotte sneered.

Laura watched as Charlotte disappeared into the ladies room, and she shook her head. Charlotte could be okay some days, but they were few and far between, today she was obviously being a bitch, and she didn't like the fact that Laura was never in trouble with management like herself. Laura looked at her watch and scurried downstairs to get her first job off Liz.

For a moment, she'd forgotten about her power, but then she remembered. From now on... work didn't have to be boring.
1111322.title: Omnipotent Laura.

1112.content:
Okay, same as before, who acquires the powers in question or finds something of 'interest' etc.?

Again, the story can be in either Second Person or Third Person.
1112.title: Carly's beauty salon.

11121.content:
Steven again huh? Okay then, maybe one of the many pieces of jewelry sold by Carly and Zoe in the salon gives Steven his powers? Or some form of energy appears out of nowhere and merges with him, giving him 'other-wordly' powers? Too far-fetched?? Hey...this is an interactive story, not real life.

And you'll have to figure out what kind of power he 'acquires' of course.
11121.title: Steven?

choices: Morphing others (and their clothes) to extremely fine degrees...
111212.title: Nope, something else.

choices: Carly sends Kay out to buy them breakfast.
111213.content:
Kay rushed into the door of the salon, knowing just the kind of welcome she was going to get from Carly. "You're late!" Carly grumbled, as she stopped searching on her cell phone long enough to look up and give Kay a glare.

"I know, I... I'm sorry, the um... the bus was late." Kay apologized. "Not all of us can afford to drive sports cars you know." Kay then thought, making sure to keep that little reply in her head, as it would only piss Carly off more than she obviously already was, for some reason.

"We need you to rebook Chantelle's appointment Kay." Zoe said as she clicked into the room on her heels. "She had to cancel."

"Er... okay, I'll get on that, let me just hang my coat up." Kay nodded, taking it all in stride, as she had learned to do.

Kay then settled into her normal work day, which would involve answering the telephone, rescheduling appointments and cleaning the salon. Although she was a qualified beautician herself, Carly and Zoe saw to most of the clients. Kay's docile behavior and willingness to put up with crap from her co-workers was all the more astonishing considering she had been given an amazing power after accidentally reading a spell from a book on ancient witchcraft two weeks ago.

The power was the ability to swap things between people, anything from entire bodies... to body parts... and even personalities or fashion sense, absolutely anything. She could also make the people she swapped aware of the changes... or entirely oblivious. Yet despite all this... she had only tested the power once, on her boyfriend at home one night. And even then all she had the nerve to do was concentrate and to swap his mannerisms with her own. It had been quite funny seeing him act feminine all night. But Kay had also discovered just how life-changing her powers could be if she 'really' used them. Which was why she had not yet used them again.

But today, she was finally ready to start using her powers on other people, more out of curiosity than anything. But also for fun. And she knew there would be an endless stream of clients walking in the doors, mainly female... but also some men too. As she scribbled a date in the appointment book, Kay couldn't help but smile to herself. She might even have the nerve to mess with Carly and Zoe today, to bring them down a peg or two... but probably not permanently, she mused. The idea was appealing to Kay.

But for now, she'd see how her day went.
111213.title: Kay has the power.

1112131.content:
Today was the day that Kay was going to use her new powers because she had a new attitude. Kay had always been the type of person that people walked all over, Carly her boss and supposed friend had always walked all over her. All of Kay's boyfriends were the domineering type and she would do what they wanted. But even though she did, the boyfriends would eventually get bored with her and move onto someone else. Random people on the street too, it seemed to Kay like she was the world's welcome mat, people just loved to wipe their feet all over her. But that changed early this morning. Kay had had enough and she now had the power to do something about it.

Kay's boyfriend, Mark told her that he expected her to clean the house from top to bottom by the time he got home from work. Mark worked a slightly different shift from Kay which meant that Kay would have the three hours between the time she arrived home and her boyfriend to arrive home to clean the house. Not that it was so dirty, but still he could pitch in after all he wasn't leaving for work for three hours.

"But why does it have to be cleaned today?"

"Because my mother is coming tonight. I want it to be nice for her." Mark's mother was a perfectionist. If everything wasn't in its proper place she complained. Kay didn't know why Mark invited his mother without giving her fair warning. If she had then she could have prepared. Kay really didn't have time to clean if Mark didn't pitch in. With Mark's mother coming, Kay would have to stop off at the market before getting home to buy groceries. She would also have to make something nice for dinner for the three of them. Kay had planned on leftovers tonight.

"Well she is your mother, why don't you clean up for her?" Kay said in a quiet tone. This was as close to a backbone as Kay had.

"Because it's your job."

Kay was about to crumble when she decided to use her powers and make a little swap between them. Kay swapped her force of will (or lack of) with Mark's. Kay now felt much stronger. "I said, she is your mother, you clean up the flat for her." Kay said in a louder tone.

"But, it's woman's work." Mark said in a hushed tone similar to what Kay had just used. Kay decided to use her power again, although she really didn't have to, she knew she could make him do it now just by glaring at him. Using her power, Kay swapped all of her domestic responsibilities with Mark.

"Who's work is it?" Kay said in a raised tone.

Mark now felt as if he did almost all of the domestic tasks for the household. Defeated and looking down at his shoes he said, "It's mine."

"Fine, you had better start now."

Mark did as he was told. Kay waited to watch him for a while. This was the real reason she was now late. Kay didn't mind as much, she had a stronger personality now. Mark would do a great job in cleaning the apartment or there would be more swaps being made. Kay didn't want to swap anything else with Mark, but Mark's mother would be here tonight and she had a host of traits that would suit the new more submissive Mark.

That was an hour ago. Now she was back at work doing Carly's bidding. The clients had started entering the salon. Kay wanted to test out her new powers on other people not herself so she looked for a test case.

The world treated Kay as their doormat or so it seemed but there were exceptions. One of the nicest people around was Helene, who was nice to everyone. Helene was quite a plus sized woman. Well plus sized didn't really sum it up, she was just plain fat. Today was the time for Helene's appointment and Kay wanted to do the nice woman herself. But Zoe wouldn't allow her. Kay was strong enough emotionally to argue with her, but Zoe was still her boss, well sort of, and it wouldn't work.

But Kay had decided to have her revenge and test her powers at the same time. Kay transferred the body fat from Helene to Zoe. Zoe plumped up and Helene shrank down. Soon, Helene was swimming in her clothes and Zoe's clothes were so tight she had trouble breathing. Kay tried to fix this by making Zoe's clothes expand to fit her widening frame and the opposite for Helene. Kay wasn't sure if it would work, but it did. Soon Zoe weighed in the 100+ kilo range and Helene was more than half that. Neither noticed anything strange, not even the momentary mishap with their clothing.

But the big test came when Carly came over to tell Zoe something. Carly didn't notice that her best friend had doubled in size. Kay was now ready to use her powers more often. She wasn't the same meek little woman who woke up this morning. She was now strong (and a little bit nasty) because of what she swapped with Mark and no one was going to keep her down anymore.

What happens next?
1112131.title: Using her powers.

choices: Kay practices her powers waiting for noon
Simon's mistress and her boy arrive at the salon
Carly stalls Simon waiting for his mistress to arrive
11121311.content:
Even though Kay was in the back she could hear what was going on in the front of the store. Carly had installed sort of a reverse baby monitor so she could summon anyone in the back if she needed her. So when Carly confided in Zoe Kay heard it all.

"I just found out, Simon has been having an affair." Carly said to Zoe. Simon is Carly's husband, they had been married for almost a decade and throughout most of that time Simon had been having affairs on her.

"You've been saying that forever."

"I know and he always denied it, but I just found out he has a seven year old son. He can't deny it now."

"How did you find out?"

"He told his mistress that he wasn't the boy's father and she made him take a paternity test. I found the results when looking through some papers."

"You were snooping?"

"I should have been, but no, I was looking for something because I had to fill out the SA100 (British tax form) and I found the test. There is no denying it now."

"Did you confront him?"

"No, he wasn't home. But I will. I have a plan, I have already contacted the woman and gave her a coupon for a free haircut for her boy. I told her she won a contest or something and she would have to come down here to get her prize."

"She'll come here for a free haircut?"

"Well I told her that she also won £1,000 and she had to pick it up at noon today."

"OK, so what are you going to do, scratch her eyes out?"

"Well I told Simon to be here too at noon and then I'll confront them both."

"You are so devious!"

Kay over heard all this. Kay didn't think that it was nice for Carly to pick on Kay just because she had personal problems outside of work. Plus Kay had lots of built in resentment from all of the things she had to put up with over the years. Kay would bide her time and then fix Carly when the time was right....say at about noon.
11121311.title: Plot point: Kay overhears Carly

111213112.content:
Noon had finally arrived and Simon's mistress, Imogen arrived with her son Ryan.. Imogen knew who Carly was but she didn't think that Carly knew of her existence. They had come for Ryan's supposed free haircut.

Imogen was a very sexy woman who felt that the world belonged to her. She had wanted Simon and even though he was married she had gotten him. Simon was to blame for his weakness but Imogen was still a demanding woman (and a great fuck.) Ryan is seven years old and in the first grade. Imogen treated the poor boy more like a trophy than a son. She dominated his life and decided everything about it. She picked his school, his apparel, his friends and all of his activities. Ryan wanted the stuff that all the other boys had, but Imogen decided what her son should have and she didn't care what others (including her son thought.) The boy could protest but Imogen just didn't care what he had to say. Ryan found it best not to argue with her since he wasn't going to win regardless.

Imogen greeted Carly with the aire of Queen Elizabeth greeting the janitor at the palace. Even though Imogen was curious about Carly she didn't hold her to account. "I have this certificate," she stated matter of factly, "it says my son gets a free haircut and I get 1000 pounds."

Carly didn't know exactly what Imogen looked like before this. But now she had the woman face to face. Carly had to stall the woman until Simon got here and she could confront them both. "Surely," Carly said putting on a false smile, "your son will be taken care of immediately, but the prize money will have to wait until forms are filled out."

"OK. if we must." Imogen said this with a dismissive sigh, but even Imogen knew that there would be paper work.

"Kay," Carly called, "can you see to this young man?" Kay did as she was bidden and took him to one of the chairs for the clients. Meanwhile, Carly took Imogen to a side room to wait for Simon to arrive.

"What type of hair cut would you like young man?" Kay asked Ryan. When the boy walked in he had the traditional boy's haircut of a medium short hair with part on the right side.

"Just like this he said," tentatively. He didn't want this type of haircut, he wanted with the other boys had, but he was afraid to say. Kay picked up on this quickly.

"No, what you really like?" After a little coaxing the boy explained what he wanted. This was the first time he was left alone with the barber since his mom had been taken by Carly to receive her reward money. It seems Ryan wanted a haircut that the hair on top of his head was very short, about 3 millimeter's long and shaved on the sides. Lots of the kids in school had it and he wanted it too. Kay set to work on the boys head.

By talking to the boy, Kay found out how domineering his mother truly was. She knew the type. By the time Kay had finished the haircut, Simon had arrived. Carly, Imogen and Simon were having a big argument when Kay returned with Ryan. When Imogen saw Ryan and she realized that it was all a setup and that she would never get her 1000 pounds, Imogen grabbed Ryan by the hand and pulled him towards the door. But before Imogen left, Kay used her powers to swap the bodies of Carly and Ryan.

Carly found herself being pulled by her small arms out the door by Imogen. Carly tried to resist, but her seven-year-old body was no match for the grown woman. Soon she was strapped into Imogen's car and driven away.

Simon had had enough of both women for the moment and left too. He made sure he went in a different direction than Imogen. Ryan, now in Carly's body was stunned, but only Kay knew what had happened. Kay proceeded to ask Ryan leading questions.

Kay to Ryan (who now has Carly's body), "Do you want me to do Mrs. Kelly's perm?"

Ryan simply said "Yeah." Ryan got through the day by telling Carly's employees to handle the customers. Kay stayed close and helped the stunned boy with useful suggestions. Ryan was so happy to be out from his mom's thumb that he resolved not to tell anyone what had happened. On the other hand, Carly tried to explain but Imogen was having none of it. Imogen had never cared much for what Ryan had to say and she was now especially pissed at him because of the haircut he got. That was the reason that she told 'him' but the real reason was that the confrontation with Carly had disturbed her more than she wanted to let on. Regardless the body-swap nonsense that Carly was trying to tell Imogen was being totally dismissed by Imogen. Finally when they got home. Carly continued to tell Imogen what had happened but Imogen had had enough of that and she took Carly over her knee and gave her a spanking. Carly was told to stop and that if (s)he tried to say that that (s)he would get worse. Carly tried one more time later. This time, Imogen used a brush to administer the spanking, Carly never mentioned it again after that.
111213112.title: Simon's mistress and her boy arrive at the ...

choices: Carly wakes up in the morning in her new body.
Carly tries to escape in the night.
1112131121.content:
As Imogen was pulling her 'son' out of the door of the salon (Beautylicious) Mrs. Cabot happened to be coming into the same shop. Mrs. Cabot brought her son in the shop every two weeks like clockwork to have his hair trimmed. Kay knew this since Mrs. Cabot always insisted that Kay trim her son's hair. As the two ladies passed each other, Kay swapped the loyalty of Mrs. Cabot to bring her son here every two weeks with Imogen's desire. Mrs. Cabot immediately turned on her heels and left the salon. Kay thought she might have lost a very good client, but it would be brilliant for Imogen to bring 'her son' back here every two weeks. Kay knew she wanted to see that 'boy' again.

Imogen pulled the struggling Carly out to the car. She didn't know why the kid put up such a fuss. Carly was screaming, "I'm not me!" which made perfect sense to her but to no one else. But Imogen wanted to get the bloody hell out of this place and pulled 'her son.' to her car.

Once she got to the car, she forced Carly into a child safety seat and buckled her in. Imogen didn't trust her son and had a version of the seat that was impossible to open when one was strapped into it. Once Imogen was in the car and they drove off, Carly calmed down enough to try and explain her situation.

"Look Imogen, I'm not your son, I'm Carly Winchester," Carly tried to explain.

"Ryan, I am not in the mood for your foolishness," Imogen was in a stern tone. "and little boys don't call their mother's by their first names. You stop that."

"But it's true, I"m not Ryan, I'm Carly."

"Listen young man, I don't know what has gotten into you, but Mommy isn't in the mood."

"Imogen, I"m not Ryan."

"Yeah sure," Imogen said humouring the boy, "and you have better start calling me mommy or I'll show you what for when we get home."

Carly knew that dismissive tone, "I'm not Ryan," she pleaded again.

Imogen by now had stopped listening to 'her son' and turned up the music louder. Carly, began to yell over the music.

"RYAN MICHAEL JOHNSON YOU STOP THAT THIS INSTANT!" Imogen bellowed.

"Listen, I'm not your son, how can I make you understand?" This back and forth went on for until the two got to Imogen's flat. Imogen turned off her car, got out and then retrieved 'her son." from the back. Normally she would let the boy walk on his own to the flat, but she was so mad at him that she snatched him by the elbow and forced him into the apartment. Carly protested all the way. Once inside she forced the diminutive boy on her lap, pulled down his pants and spanked him. The boy's backside had been reddened from other spankings that happened before the swap.

It didn't matter, the spanking hurt as Imogen used all her strength to discipline her boy. Spanking the boy made Imogen feel better and so she spanked him longer than she normally did. By the end of the spanking, Carly was crying like a child.

"Now, will you called mommy by her first name again?"

"N n n o, Mommy."

"Good and will you stop this nonsense about you not being Ryan?"

"Yes, mommmmy."

"Now go up to your room, and if I ever hear this foolishness from you again, next time I'll use the brush." Carly knew this was no threat. She got down off of Imogen's lap and pulled up her pants. She 'explored the flat quickly to find out which was Ryan's room and then she went inside. She discovered she couldn't sit after the spanking so she laid down on the bed stomach first. She rarely did this at home because it was uncomfortable due to her boobs.

Once lying down in Ryan's room, Carly set about to think. She didn't know what had happened. One moment she was telling this woman to get on her bike and the next moment she was being pulled out the door by this crazy lady.

Carly didn't know what to do. She needed to get back to Beautylicious but she couldn't drive in this body. She wasn't tall enough even if she stole the keys and the car. She thought that maybe she could tell an adult but who would believe her. She could call the coppers and tell them she had been abused. But that wouldn't get her body back and they wouldn't believe her anyway. Then she hit upon it, she could phone them. She didn't know what good it would do but it would do something. But then she found that Imogen's phone had a block on it, she couldn't call out. Carly was finding out that Ryan was more like Imogen's prisoner than her son. Carly decided to bide her time and stay in the flat until she could figure something out.

Imogen called 'Ryan' down for supper. Carly who was truly hungry came. It was tough sitting on the chair with her bruised backside but she didn't complain. She didn't want the brush. Carly didn't know for sure whether Imogen actually used a brush but she didn't want to find out. Carly supposed that the crazy lady who was sleeping with her husband probably did use a brush. Carly kept her mouth shut during dinner. Imogen didn't want to hear 'him' anyway. They finished dinner and then Imogen said, "You can watch the teley for another 45 minutes and then get into your jammies, brush your teeth and go right to bed. You have school tomorrow.

Carly hadn't considered that she would have to go to 'school' in the morning, but tomorrow was Monday and all children had school on Mondays. Carly didn't bother watching the teley, she simply put on the boys' jammies and laid in bed thinking about what to do. Carly couldn't see any answers.
1112131121.title: Follow Carly

choices: Carly tries to phone her friends
Carly tries to tell an adult that she isn't Ryan
11121311211.content:
In the morning, Imogen woke up Carly. There was no alarm clock in Ryan's room and Carly didn't want to wake up to her nightmare early anyway. Carly spent half the night thinking about what to do. Carly wanted to run away but where could she go. No one would believe her, why would they she was obviously a little boy. She could start talking about 'adult' things but that wouldn't work. The only way was to get to Zoe or Christie and try and convince them. They knew her better than anyone. But Carly didn't have access to a phone and she couldn't travel to the salon, it was obviously too far to walk. Besides as Carly would find out, as a seven-year-old you are watched all the time.

Imogen laid out the clothing that she wanted 'Ryan' to wear and Carly put it on. Kay told Andrea that she had to stop by a primary school to talk to someone. They were going at lunch time so that would also be the time that Carly and her class would be in the school yard. The plan was to bump into Carly seemingly accidentally. So far everything was going like clockwork.

Once they got to the school, Kay didn't have to go very far before Carly ran over to them. Carly's mom and Kay, one of her friends, had come to save her she thought. Carly thought she would be saved from this nightmare or at least try and prove that this crazy thing happened.

"Mom, Kay you have to get me out of here!" Carly said excitedly.

"I know you are not going to believe this but, I am Carly your daughter," Carly said to Andrea.

"I don't have a daughter and you are definitely not a girl."

"No, it's me Carly, you have to believe me mum." Carly said she didn't realize that Andrea had said she didn't even have a daughter which was true of Helen.

"Young man you are confused."

"I know this is confusing, but I swear, I"m your daughter, I swapped bodies with this boy." Carly said indicating herself.

"That is just ridiculous. I don't even HAVE A DAUGHTER." Kay stood quietly trying not to smile. This was going perfectly, how could Carly prove to Andrea that she was her daughter if Andrea didn't even know she had a daughter in the first place.

"Yes you do, and I'm it. I mean I used to be. I mean I am in here."

"Look young man, I don't know what trick you are trying to prove, but it's not funny."

Then to Kay, "Kay you know me, I've been your friend for years. I hired you at my salon."

"You have."

"Yes, I remember, we were sitting in your flat and you didn't have a job. I told you, if you started beauty school, I could hire you to sweep up and then you would be doing real styling when you graduated."

"My boss, Ms. Grossinger hired me after I graduated beauty school because I wanted to be a stylist. I wasn't unemployed. Your story doesn't make sense."

"Yes that's right, but no one named Carly hire me." This was great, she would tear down all of Carly's hopes. Carly would never try to contact her old life again. She would think that no one knew her.

"How did I know that?"

"I don't know you found out somehow, but the rest of your story is nuts." Then to Andrea, "and Andrea doesn't even have a daughter. She doesn't even know the person I work for."

By this time one of the attendants for the school yard had arrived. She shooed Carly away from the two strangers. After Carly left, Kay told Andrea they had better get out of here. Then they had lunch and Kay returned Andrea back to Wilkos. Before leaving the store, Kay returned Andrea's and Helen's family relationships back to normal. No one was any the wiser and the plan had gone flawlessly.

“Carly is busy in the back, she doesn’t want to be disturbed. And Zoe is with a teenage client, learning the trade… slowly.” Kay answered. “Can I… take a message?” Kay said, sitting down behind the reception desk.

“No thank you, I’d just like to speak with them.” Christie frowned, thinking that her friendship with the two gave her special privileges.

Kay did not agree.

11132.content:
The characters of John and Frank Parker and their wives are the creations of m2, from his story 'Head Swapping'.

In the High Street, not far from the Wilko store, two tourists from the United States were taking in the sights. John Parker, 43, and his older brother Frank, 47, were on vacation abroad for the first time with their wives Rachel, 40 and Irene, 37. After much discussion about their destination, (the choices being France, England or Italy), the wives got their way, England it was. And it was several weeks since John and Frank had finally managed to correct most of the 'chaos' they had caused with their head swapping device back home. With the exception of a few individuals, everyone had got their own bodies back, including our two intrepid couples.

But it was Frank's idea to bring the device with them on vacation, and John went along with it. After all they had refrained from using it for a long time (except for the time Frank swapped with his unsuspecting wife in order to make sex a little more interesting for a couple of nights). Being the 'discoverer' the device, Frank was pretty much in charge of it.

"Ya know we should have waited for them to get ready. They're pissed with us now" Frank said, eliciting a sigh from John. "I bet they still haven't left the hotel room yet" he then added, referring to their wives. Though 'hotel' was slightly misleading, since they had all checked into a little Bed & Breakfast run by a middle-aged Welsh couple.

"They'll probably want to go clothes shopping anyway" John responded. "And I'm not being dragged off to some mall while Rachel tries to pick out an outfit she wants to buy" he grumbled.

"Ya think she's bad? Go shopping with Irene then tell me who's worse!" Frank stated, shaking his head.

Both brothers then fell silent for a moment while they took in the sights. The town, Rotherham, was certainly full of foreigners, mainly other Europeans but also Pakistanis and Indians among others. That was on top of the local population. "Do they even have border control here?" John joked.

"I guess not!" Frank muttered. He then spotted a store a little ways down the street and drew John's attention to it. "Let's go in here, I need a drink of soda or something anyway, I'm parched" he said.

"I'm with you bro!" John agreed readily. And they went into Wilko.

After heading over to the nearest fridge to pick a drink, the brothers took note of the staff members, all wearing red blouses or shirts with the company name emblazened on the back. And the store was quite full of customers browsing assorted products, everything from paint to pet food, groceries to home furnishings. John tapped Frank on the shoulder and smirked. "You got the device with you?" he asked.

Frank gave his little brother a smile back. "I never go anywhere without it" he said, patting his pocket.

People were intimidated by his managerial position, he soon found. They tried to slip out of sight when they saw him coming, and feigned smiles and polite interest when he cornered them. They asked him how his day was going, to which his reply was 'fucking excellent, thanks'.

But they didn't like him. When he tried to talk to Aaron, the young man simply told him to "fuck off and let me do my job". That saddened Bernie. He had always regarded Aaron as being as close to a friend as he had in the store. Now he had lost even him.

As he approached Elizabeth, who was by now pulling chewing gum out of the coin slot of a vending machine, he noticed a young man creep up behind her and tap her on the shoulder. Elizabeth turned in alarm, her flabby chins wobbling, and broke into a broad smile.

Bernie watched them from behind a pyramid of 50% off wood varnish with a sense of growing injustice. Even in his old body she had her loving fiance, she was still happier than he ever had been. It wasn't fair!

It was a rather slow friday afternoon. With the shop floor so quiet, Steven had been given the job of dismantling the mannequins in the window display and placing them in storage. At the moment, he was heading for the service lift with a plastic torso under one arm and a variety of limbs under the other.

The service lift took an age to arrive, and when it did the doors squeaked and juddered open. The light inside flickered. Steven hated this lift. It was ancient and bad tempered. Just as he stepped inside, he heard a female voice cry out, "Wait, hold that for me!" He turned to see Liz hurrying towards the lift and instinctively put out his hand between the sliding doors to keep them open.

The metal doors clamped shut around his wrist, trapping his hand on the outside. In alarm, he dropped everything and began to hammer on the door-open button, but the lift refused. He pushed his fingers into the crack between the doors and desperately tried to pry them open, but they wouldn't budge. Fear overtook him as the lift began to move upwards, slowly at first, dragging his arm towards the ground. If he couldn't get his hand free it would be sliced off. Aware that he had only seconds, he braced his foot against the door, wrapped his hand around his trapped arm and pulled.

His arm stretched out with a the pliability of soft rubber. His hand squeezed through the crack in the door at the last moment, the arm snapping back like elastic. He staggered back, staring at his arm distended like a limp rubber snake on the floor of the lift, as it slowly shrank back to its normal size. He touched the skin; it felt strangely rubbery. He found that by flexing the muscles in his arm he could encourage it to shrink faster.

The lift dinged and he stepped out into the second story warehouse. He heard running footsteps on the stairs and Liz arrived breathless and wide-eyed. "Are you alright? *gasp* Oh my God, I thought you were going to lose your arm. *gasp* That fucking lift. *gasp* Do you need an ambulance?"

"Actually... I think I'm alright," he said, showing her his arm, safe and whole. "Do me a favour, pull my finger."

"After what just happened, I hardly think this is the time for jokes."

"Please just pull it."

Rolling her eyes, she reached out and tugged on the end of his index finger. She leapt back with a squeal of disgust as it stretched out.

"What the hell is that!"

"Holy shit, I'm stretch armstrong."

Unable to stand just yet, he slumped back down against a wall, and as he did so he felt a peculiar 'shifting' sensation on his chest. Steven then passed out again for a few minutes only to wake in the same place where he had slumped. His head seemed clearer now, and his hearing was back to normal, he raised his head slowly and looked around, his friends and co-workers were all laid unconscious on the shop floor, though some were waking like himself. "What the fuck happened?" he muttered under his breath as he put his hands on his head.

"I should call an ambulance or something" he then murmured, but then he frowned as he ran his hands over to the back of his head...and he found a ponytail. "What the..." he gasped, giving it a sharp tug. "Ow!!" he exclaimed loudly, and instantly noticed his voice sounded wrong.

The biggest shock was waiting for him though when he lowered his hands to his chest to investigate the extra weight he seemed to be carrying. His hands rested on two fleshy mounds that were distending his shirt. "Holy...fuck!" Steven blurted out in amazement. He had breasts, ...big breasts!!

As he sat there groping the boobs he now possessed, Steven studied his clothing, he still had on his polo shirt, at least he thought he did, they all looked the same after all. But as he looked down at his feminine trousers and lace-up, flat black shoes...he finally realized he was wearing Liz's clothes. 2+2 still made 4 and so Steven also realized that somehow...he was now in Liz's body. These were HER boobs he was fondling...with HER hands. Sure enough when he looked at his left 2nd finger he saw he was now wearing Liz's engagement and wedding rings. Michael took the bear from his mother and instinctively hugged it to his chest to the left of his right breast. He also put his thumb into his mouth and began to suck. Even though Michael had the body of a grown woman his gestures belied his true age of five.

"Now honey, I know i look different. But I am mummy. I know this has been hard on you. But if you're a good boy, I'll let you play with all of your toys." Melissa named all of Michael's toys using the names he has for them. "When we get home."

Does this convince Michael?
11312211122122322.title: No they didn't.

choices: Go downstairs and check if anybody else had changed again
1131221112212233.content:
Steven then felt a familiar feeling. He became a bit disoriented, as he almost fell out of his seat. He looked around at everybody else in the room, and they seemed to be going through the same discomfort he was. His ears begun to pulsate, and he brought his hands over them to try and ease the pain and ringing that he was hearing. The pain the skyrocketed into an intense migraine that brought him to a fetal position as he fell out of his seat, onto the floor. He smelt something foul in the air, sort of like, pennies. His eyes grew wide, as he realized what was happening.

There was about to be another shift.

He opened his mouth to scream, but all he was met with was a blinding flash of light.



.....


Steven woke up from the ground and rubbed his head. "Sheesh my aching head" he whispered to himself. He looked around his surroundings and realized that it had happened again. He knew this because he say his on body to the right of himself, and he saw Liz's body in front of the chair he was sitting in. He looked at his hands, and seen tiny fingers and a small palm. "Shit" he thought to himself, "I'm in the kid's body".

The others in the office slowly woke up, not realizing that their bodies had been shifted again. Steven heard crying coming from one of the bodies in front of him, and he traced it back to Liz's body, who was still laying on the ground. He walked over and asked, "Hey it's Steven. I think we all got switched again. Who are you?".

Liz's body sniffled, "I'm Michael. Why did that happen again Mr. Steven?". Michael opened his eyes, and seen that Steven was now in control of his body. "Hey, you're me Mr. Steven!", Michael said happily, as he wiped his tears. Steven smiled, "Yeah buddy, and I'm gonna make sure to take care of your body for your, okay?". Steven rubbed Michael's scalp playfully. "But if you're me now, then who am I now Mr. Steven?" Michael looked at his hands, and seen well-kept nails with a clear coat, as well as palms that had dealt with callous' in the past. He looked down at his chest to see that he was now the owner of two incredibly large breasts. Michael laughed, "Haha, I have boobies like mommy now".

Steven laughed at the child's discovery of his new body, but then quickly remembered about the others in the room. He turned around and seen that the other bodies were coming to. He walked over to Elizabeth's body, which managed to stay in the chair while the shift was occurring. He introduced himself as Steven, and that he thought that everything shifted again.

"Steven, luv, it's me" Liz muttered as she slowly opened her eyes. She scanned the room to see Michael's (now Steven) small body in front of her, Steven's body trying to stand up, Laura's body helping Steven's body up, and her own body, grabbing her breasts. "Um, Steven? Who is in charge of my body now?" Liz said nervously. "Uh, I think the kid got it" Steven laughed, with his tongue in his cheek. "Better him that some pervert" Liz tried to convince herself.

Steven walked over to his body and Laura's body, who were both obviously still disoriented from the second shift. He gave them the run down on everything that had happened, and discovered that Elizabeth had his body now, and Michael's mom took over Laura's body.

These are the results of the second swap (thus far):
Michael - Liz's body
Michael's mom - Laura's body
Steven - Michael's body
Elizabeth - Steven's body
Liz - Elizabeth's body


The adults huddled, and tried to decide on what their next move should be.
1131221112212233.title: Reader's choice.

1131222.content:
"Ugh... Liz, what happened?" Steven's body asked.

Steven, who was now inhabiting Liz's body for some unknown reason, was even more concerned than before when he realized it wasn't Liz in there. Then... this wasn't just a regular body swap... he thought, gazing at whoever it was that had ended up in his body. "Um... can you just humour me for a moment and tell me your name?" he asked.

His own body sat up off the hard and uncomfortable floor, looking him in the face with an eyebrow raised. "You kidding?" they asked bluntly. "...It's me, Natalie."

"Natalie?!" Steven repeated in surprise.

"...What's wrong, Liz? And... what's with my voice?" Natalie looked around and noticed the countless unconscious bodies lying on the floor, as well as many very confused groups of customers who were all pointing fingers at one another in shock. She looked back at who she thought was Liz, seeking an answer.

"Natalie," her supervisor began, "I'm not Liz. I'm Steven." She paused. "...And you're me." At this, the girl in Steven's body made a very skeptical face, but as she gazed around the store again, she could make out a plethora of voices nearby:

"Why do I look like Mommy?"

"No, I can't... I can't be a man!"

"No, I'm not your fucking daughter!"

It seemed surreal, in a way. Grown men acting like young women and vice-versa--it certainly wasn't normal. Putting it together in her head, Natalie glanced back at Liz, then down at herself, and finally she grabbed a mirror from behind the help desk and looked at her new face. "I'm... I'm really Steven..." she said to herself in utter disbelief.

"I don't understand this either, Natalie, but we need to stay calm and find the rest of our friends, alright?" Steven suggested, doing his best to contain the wave of emotions going through him at that moment. Natalie closed her eyes and nodded begrudgingly as Steven grabbed her hand and pulled her alongside him throughout the store, wading through the frantic crowds in the aftermath of what they could only assume was something like a citywide body exchange. After a few harsh minutes of forcing their way through the pandemonium, the two of them escaped to the second floor, where they saw...
1131222.title: Someone else was in his body.

11312221.content:
Steven and Nataile were about to enter the tea room when Natalie's body came running up to them. "Liz, oh my god, Liz... something weird is happening, I'm in Natalie's body!" she screeched at Steven frantically.

Steven took another disbelieving glance down at his huge bust and then looked at Natalie's body." I know, I know, and... I'm not Liz, I'm Steven." he said in his supervisor's voice.

"Really?? Wow... this is freaky." Rebekah gasped.

Natalie meanwhile was dumbfounded, staring at her own body as someone else controlled it. "Who are you? That's my body!" she grumbled.

"Oh god. Natalie?! I... it's weird, I don't know how I ended up in your body. Its me... Rebekah."

Upon hearing that, Natalie seemed a little relieved, knowing it was another girl inside her body and not a man. "Calm down, it's okay, we don't know what's happened either." Natalie told Rebekah.

All three of them were now staring down in curiosity at the bodies they now occupied, especially Steven and Natalie. The latter was already experiencing her first erection in Steven's body and was too embarrassed to mention it to Steven. And it only got worse as she looked up and watched Steven fondling Liz's former breasts.

"We should find Elizabeth and Liz, maybe they'll know what to do." Rebekah suggested, brushing Natalie's hair from her face.

"Good idea. Maybe put out a tannoy accouncement or something?" Natalie added.

"Yeah, you're probably right." Steven nodded.
11312221.title: ...Natalie's body rushing towards them.

choices: The woman spanks Liz's bum and pulls her away
Natalie and Steven restrain the woman
113122213.content:
A few minutes had passed and despite the pandemonium most people had figured out what had happened. Everyone was different and each handled the event in their own way. Some panicked some tried to do something useful. A little girl ran up to Steven, "You have my body," the little girl said.

"Liz?" Steven asked making the obvious assumption.

"Yes, who are you?" the little girl asked.

"I'm Steven."

"Good, I was afraid that a customer would be in my body."

"No, it's me."

Liz took charge. She was a professional all the way even if she wasn't in her own body. "OK, Steven, we have to close the store and get everyone out of here who doesn't belong here. If we don't do something, people will start stealing our stuff."

Steven thought, "We have bigger problems than people stealing the inventory" But he went along with whatever Liz said. She was in charge. Well Elizabeth was in ultimate charge but Steven didn't know where she was.

"The first thing we have to do," Liz continued, "is to figure out who is the staff and who is not. Who are you guys?" Liz addressed the bodies of Steven, and Natalie.

"I'm Natalie," Steven's body said. "I'm Rebekah," Natalie's body said.

"OK, Steven you have my keys, give them to me." Liz needed them to gain control over the store. Once she got her keys. "I want you to go to the entrances, may sure no one leaves with stuff that isn't paid for."

"You expect us to stop this crowd?" Natalie said incredulously.

"Do your best. I am going to the cash registers to lock everything down." This is what she needed the keys for. If you run into anyone who is staff, I don't care what they look like have them help you. We have to get everyone out of here, that is our number one concern."

The three were about to do as they were told. There wasn't really anything else to do. In a way they were just happy someone was taking charge. But before they could get going a woman grabbed Liz's arm (in her little girl body) and said, "Honey, how many times have I told you to stay by mommy?"

What happens next?
113122213.title: Liz suddenly shows up.

1131222132.content:
Correctly assuming that the woman hadn't been affected by whatever had affected nearly everyone else, Natalie and Steven proceeded to prevent her from dragging Liz away. "Ma'am, this might sound ridiculous, but that's not your daughter anymore. She's our supervisor." Natalie explained as she used her new strength to hold the woman back while Steven stepped in between Liz and the little girl's mother.

"What?? Don't be stupid. I think I know my own daughter when I see her. Now let me go, this is harrassment." the woman growled in response, as she looked up into Natalie's bespectacled face.

"Haven't you seen what's happened?" Steven cut in, gesturing to the people around them..

The woman looked around, and then shrugged. "So what, people passed out. It happens all the time." she mumbled.

"THIS happens all the time?? A mass body swap??" Liz squeaked in her little girl's voice.

"Stop with the silly stories Ellie!!" the woman admonished Liz, wagging her finger at her. However Liz wasn't impressed and stood there with her hands firmly on her hips staring up at the woman.

"I'm not your bloomin' daughter!" Liz snapped, getting impatient.

"I don't know what game you're playing young lady, but it stops right now. You're embarrassing me!" the woman shouted at Liz, refusing to believe anything that anyone was telling her. "And you..." she growled at Steven, seeing that his name badge identified him as 'Liz: Evening Supervisor', "tell this man to stop handling me or I'll be making a complaint to your superiors." she said, trying to shake off Natalie's grasp.

"I'm not a man!" Natalie complained. Then she frowned and looked down at herself. Technically... she was now.

"This is gone on long enough. Let me take my daughter home!" the woman screamed.
1131222132.title: Natalie and Steven restrain the woman

11312221321.content:
"Look Madam, I am not your daughter. I don't know what happened, but it seems I switched bodies with your daughter."

"You switched bodies with my daughter? Stop that Ellie. Wait, if you switched doesn't that mean Ellie is in your body? So then show me your body. That must be Ellie." The woman didn't believe a thing she had just said.

Liz knew that wasn't true since apparently Steven was in her body. "Well no."

"Right because you are my daughter."

"No, I'm Liz the Supervisor."

"I thought she was the supervisor," the woman said indicating Steven who was in Liz's body.

"That's my body." Steven nodded in agreement. "I'm not your daughter, I'm an adult...I have children who are twice this age."

The woman didn't fully believe Liz, but Liz wasn't acting like the little girl the woman knew. Liz reasoned that this woman's daughter had to be in the store somewhere. "Look Ma'am, we'll make an announcement and find your daughter. What did you say her name was?"

"Ellie...Ellie Frashier."

"OK, let's go." Liz started to walk towards the help desk where she could make the announcement but the woman was still holding her arm. "Excuse me."

"OH" and the woman let go of Liz.

Throughout this exchange, store employees in whatever body they were in gathered around. They were looking for Liz (well Liz's body anyway) or Elizabeth.

A young man approached Steven, "Liz, what is going on?"

Steven in Liz's body gave the man the 'what are you nuts, isn't it obvious' look. "I don't know and I'm not Liz, I'm Steven. Who are you?"

"I know I don't look like it, but I'm Luke. This is bloody strange."

"No fuckin shit," Steven said. "You are lucky, at least you're still a man. Anyway, come with us, Liz is about to make an announcement."

"Which one is Liz?"

"See that little kid? That's her."

For a moment forgetting his own predicament Luke burst out laughing. "You're shitting me!!!"

Steven gave him another look and Luke in his new body and a couple other employees who remained silent but heard the exchange followed along. When they got to the help desk the little girl who was Liz beckoned Steven over. "OK," she said "you are going to make the announcement."

"Why can't you do it?"

"Look at me?" now it was Liz's turn to make that 'what are you kidding me' look on her little girl face.

"But I don't want to."

"I don't care, you will do it." Liz's authority returned. Liz dictated the announcement.
In the background the store's tape was playing
"somethin' I can hold on to
I know you think I'm like the others before
Who saw your name and number on the wall
Jenny, I got"

It was at this point that the music was silenced for a second and the usual bing bong sound that preceded announcements rang. For a moment that shocked the crowd into silence. Everyone was hoping someone would do something. At the moment there were in effect three groups of people. There were people who were panicking and didn't know what to do. There were people who just wanted to find their friends and family and get out of here. Finally there were people who just wanted to help.

Steven, in Liz's body and with her voice, said, "Everyone please stay calm. Elizabeth please come to the help desk. All employees please lock down your stations. I am sure the police will be coming soon." (This couldn't possibly be true if the phenomenon was more wide spread than just the store, but it was something to say. Finally, "Will Ellie Frashier come to the help desk, your mother is here."

Then the music returned. Liz thought can we turn off the bloody music? The world is coming to an end as we know it and we are listening to bloody Tommy Tutone. But what music would be more appropriate she didn't know.
11312221321.title: Liz is staying put.

113122213211.content:
After hanging up the phone, Steven let out a sigh. That was his first time using the tannoy, he hated the thing. And he was then confronted by a female customer (or rather a young man in a woman's body). "Hey, are you in charge here?" the 'woman' asked Steven.

"No I'm not ma'am." Steven answered.

"I'm not a chick, I'm just... stuck in this body." the customer said, gesturing down to himself and refraining from grabbing the 'weights' on his chest. "And that says you are in charge, doesn't it?" the customer added, pointing to the name badge on Steven's polo shirt.

"This isn't my body either, smartarse" Steven informed the customer, getting a bit lippy.

"So where's your supervisor?" the customer inquired next.

Steven paused a moment, then looked down at Liz, who was stood chatting with Natalie and Rebekah. "There she is." Steven pointed Liz out to the customer.

"Oh... er... never mind." the man in the woman's body mumbled, as the mobile phone in his pocket began going off. He didn't answer it of course, since it wasn't his phone. That was when Steven heard other phones going off in the store, clearly people checking up on their loved ones. "This is crazy!" he whispered, shaking his head. He took another disbelieving look down at the large breasts distending his shirt.

"Steven." Liz's new high pitched voice sounded out, causing him to look at her.

"What?" Steven answered.

Everyone could tell Liz was having a hard time adjusting to her new stature. Her new body was no older than 10 years old. She was shorter than almost everyone else in the store now. "We... um... we need to find Elizabeth." she told Steven, before glancing at Rebekah and Natalie in turn.

"Alright I'm here. Now what on earth is going on?" a familiar voice (to the other staff at least) suddenly sounded out. Steven, Liz and the others all turned to see Charlotte's body walk around the corner. It was clear Elizabeth was now the one wearing it. "One minute I'm telling Charlotte off, and the next..." she said, gesturing down to her teenage form. "What the hell...?" the puzzled manager muttered, trying to keep calm.

Meanwhile, all the other staff members were gathering around the Help Desk, trying to take stock of what had transpired.

"It happened to most of us Elizabeth." Liz stepped forward, eliciting a stare from Elizabeth.

"And who are you sweetie?" Elizabeth asked, addressing Liz like a child.

"Its me, Liz." the frustrated supervisor replied, folding her arms.

Elizabeth glanced over to Liz's body. "Then... who's that?" she asked.

"That's Steven, he's in my body. And Natalie is in his, and Rebekah is in Natalie's... I think." Liz said, frowning as she tried to keep track of who was now in whose bodies.

"Oh, well... crap!" Elizabeth gasped in Charlotte's voice.
113122213211.title: Elizabeth shows up

choices: People organize themselves to find their bodies and their friends.
1131222132113.content:
A man who had obviously been crying saw the woman and threw himself into her arms sobbing, "Mummy, Mummy."

Liz was relieved that that was done. She looked to Elizabeth to take charge, but somehow between the shock of the situation and not being given any training for when people swapped bodies, Elizabeth didn't know what to do.

"I think we should lock all the doors except the main entrance and put staff there to see that the inventory doesn't walk through the door," Liz suggested.

"Ummmmm, yeah, right. Let's do that."

"I also think we have to lock down the registers right now."

"OK, we'll tell the staff."

"But the staff aren't in their own bodies, they don't have the keys."

"I forgot."

"You have Charlotte's body, go to the registers and lock them down."

"OK, but what will you be doing?"

"I'll run to the doors and lock them with my keys."

"How can you have keys, your just a little girl?"

"I got them from Steven," Liz said. Then to Steven, "Announce that the store is closed and everyone should leave by the front door." Then to everyone else, "If you are still wearing your Wilkos 'uniform' I want you to go to the front door and make sure everyone who leaves isn't stealing anything."

"But what if they resist? We aren't security. Isn't this a job for security?" Natalie said.

"We don't even know who security is anymore. If someone says they are security or staff ask them their name and make sure. Just do your best."

"OK."

Then Liz ran as fast as she could like the little ten-year old she was to the doors to lock them. Steven made his announcement and everyone else went to the front door to keep the inventory from walking out unmolested.

What happens next?
1131222132113.title: Ellie finally shows up.

choices: Liz is desperate to contact Eric.
11312221321131.content:
Asides from Steven, Natalie and Rebekah (in Liz's, Steven's and Natalie's bodies), only a few other staff members showed up at the front door. Nicola had been shifted into Luke's body, Helen was in Becca's body, Charlotte was in Elizabeth's body and Laura had been swapped into Tracey's body. They instinctively went up to Liz's body to identify themselves, only for Steven to point them in the direction of the 10-year old girl that Liz now was.

All the other staff had been swapped into customers' bodies and they formed their own little group off to one side. Elizabeth took charge of this group and identified each staff member in turn. Steven was given the task of stripping the keys and any other company property from the customers who had been shifted into the bodies of Wilko employees before they were allowed to leave the store.

Once the store was secured and they had got rid of all the people they could, the doors were locked.

"Alright," Liz again squeaked in her little girl voice, "things are kind of under control I guess." she scratched her head.

"They're what??" Natalie bellowed out. "Things are NOT under control."

"Calm down Natalie." Nicola addressed Steven's body. "I'm in the same boat as you are." she told her.

"This is crazy!" Natalie whimpered.

"What about us Elizabeth?" Andrea suddenly asked. Elizabeth, in Charlotte's body, turned and looked at all six of her other staff (excluding Liz) that were now in the bodies of random customers. Tracey had been shifted into the body of a 15-year old girl. Aaron was now a 50-year old woman, Mona was a 37-year old woman, Becca was a 19-year old boy, Andrea a 30-year old man and Luke was in the body of a man just a few years old than he was. "You stay here I guess." Elizabeth shrugged, having no idea what to actually do. "Oh but there is one thing," Elizabeth mumbled, walking up to her former body, "give me my keys Charlotte?" she said, holding out her hand.

"Here, take 'em. And... haven't you got any flat shoes or anything upstairs? These heels are killing me." Charlotte whined from her manager's body.

"No I haven't, so just suck it up. There are more important things to worry about incase you haven't noticed." Elizabeth berated Charlotte, who felt embarrassed being chewed out by her own body.

"I need to phone Eric, see if he's okay." Liz mumbled in a worried tone.

Elizabeth frowned at Liz. "And supposing he's fine, do you think he'll believe a little girl who claims to be his wife? Look we've all got families we're worried about. We take things one step at a time." she said.

"So now what do we do?" Steven sighed in Liz's voice.

There was a deathly silence....
11312221321131.title: The store is secured.

113122213211311.content:
Once that all the staff was together and the doors locked, Liz realized that Elizabeth was right. Even if she called Eric whoever had his body would have his phone and that wouldn't do her any good. At first everyone thought it was a local problem, but word got through the television and the internet that it wasn't local, but it was planet wide.

Liz took charge again. "I know it isn't your job," she addressed the staff, whether they were dressed as staff or not. But we have to help these people. We have to make sure everyone finds the people they were with." Liz meant families. "Once we have done that then we can get everyone out of here and then go home ourselves." Liz thought that giving the staff something to do would help everyone. Elizabeth who was still out of it recognized Liz's management abilities. She thought that Liz would be in line for a promotion after this....Then she thought, well she was a ten-year old now, that might be a problem.

In the background, "Another One Bites The Dust" by Queen was playing. Liz wished she could turn off that damn music. Liz told Steven he had to make another announcement. Steven was getting used to being Liz's mouth piece. The usual bing bong sound was heard and Steven announced what Liz told him. "I know you want to find your loved ones. We are going to help you, so to make it easier for everyone. If your last name begins with A to F go to Home Living department. If your last name begins with a G to M go to the Garden department. If your last name begins with an N to R go to the Pets department and if your name begins with a S to Z go to the Toys department. Every child under thirteen come to the help desk and we'll announce your name one at a time to find your parents."

The people started moving since this seemed reasonable. Liz told Natalie to go to the stationery department and get all the masking tape and magic markers Liz had a plan on sending the employees to the different departments, they would get the names one at a time of the people there and write their names on the tape. Then stick the tape on them so people could find one another. This was a good plan and since everyone had something to do panic was reduced. Steven, the pervert he was, didn't even have time to play with Liz's boobs. He was too busy, it was his job to announce the children's names over the loud speaker and Liz was never far away anyway.

Liz hadn't considered that people wanted to also know who had their real bodies, but the people did what they could and many phone numbers were exchanged too.

Finally the store was cleared out of all but about two dozen non-employes who couldn't find their family or friends. Five were mentally babies and children too young to say who they were and the rest there were two possibilities. 1) Their family members had entered into babies who couldn't speak. 2) Their friends weren't in the store anymore. Either they had swapped with someone outside the store or they had went home without looking for them. The babies could be comforted with toys and dummies. All had to be diapered eventually. No one wanted to do it, but what choice did they have. Being wet was OK, but the stinky ones had to be dealt with. But what to do with the adults. Elizabeth finally found her inner manager and said they should just go home, what else was there since their family/friends weren't here.
113122213211311.title: Sit tight for now.

choices: Eric was unaffected by the Shift.
1131222132113111.content:
Elizabeth eventually told her staff to head on home for now, there was nothing more to be done at work given what had happened. "I hope the buses are still running, there's no way I'm walking home in these heels." Charlotte complained from Elizabeth's body as she trudged off upstairs to retrieve her belongings with everyone else.

As everyone was leaving, Liz reached out and grabbed her former arm, keeping Steven from running off. "Not so fast Steven, you're coming home with me." she told him.

"What??" Steven frowned. "Why?" he questioned Liz.

"Well for one, all my clothes are back at my house, so if you want to get changed, you need to come home with me." she explained. "And secondly... I'm just not letting you out of my sight." she feigned a smile, as she attempted to drag Steven towards her car.

"And how are you planning on driving?" Steven asked smugly.

"I'll sit on something and adjust the seat." a determined Liz answered. "Now come on, I'm taking you home." she said. The two of them then got into Liz's car and after a little preparation on Liz's part (bringing the seat forward so that her feet could reach the pedals) she started her engine and drove off. Steven stayed rooted to the passenger seat, rightly fearing for his safety.

Eventually Liz arrived at her house and managed to park outside without having an accident. Steven hopped out of the car first and took in a breath of air, thankful to have made it in one piece. He'd never been to Liz's house before, but he recognized her husband Eric's breakdown van parked outside.

"Come on." Liz squeaked in her high pitched voice, leading the way up the path.

She opened the front door, and Steven hesitantly followed her into the house.
1131222132113111.title: The staff go home

choices: Liz gets suspicious of Eric's new body
Steven insists he has to get home
11312221321131112.content:
The way the Great Shift worked was that when the impulse hit, everyone's 'soul' left their body and was thrown up in the air. For the moment people were out of their bodies, the psychic winds blew their 'souls' in any direction that the wind happened to be blowing at that moment. But eventually the 'soul' would return to the nearest body that it could find. It was like musical chairs when the music stopped you took a seat in the closest body. People in which the psychic wind was very slight or who were totally alone or who were very lucky got their own bodies back. But because of the psychic wind that was rare, most people got the bodies of the people who were around them. Some really unlucky people found that the bodies near them were already taken and they would bounce from body to body until they found an 'empty' one which could be hundreds of yards or even a mile or more away.

Eric at the time of the Great Shift was sharing an intimate moment with a co-worker. It was a hot young woman who worked with him. They had snuck off to a secluded area and so when they returned to their bodies, Eric received the body of his mistress and she received his. Liz knew that Eric and Helene worked together but she didn't know they were having an affair. Helene was younger than Liz, she was twenty-seven. She was taller than Liz and much thinner with perky C-cup breasts and killer legs. This was the body that Eric now inhabited.

Steven and Liz after seeing Eric's van at the house knew that Eric was home. They simply assumed that anyone who was in Liz's house must be Eric. When Eric saw Liz and a little girl arrive at his house he ran out and hugged Liz's body. Steven gave Eric a look and reluctantly said, "I'm not Liz." Despite having Liz's body, Steven did enjoy being hugged by such a hot woman. The real Liz in her prepubescent body spoke up. "I'm Liz. Eric if that is you?" Eric released his embrace from Steven and after an awkward moment of silence the three entered the house.

What happens next?
11312221321131112.title: Eric had switched bodies too.
