113122213211311121.content:
Liz looked up into Eric's pretty new face and her eyes narrowed as she put her little hands on her hips. "So I guess you were stood next to Helene when this massive swap happened then?" she asked him.

"Er... yeah, I guess I was." Eric nodded as he sat down in a chair, glancing down uncomfortably at his boobs.

"Okay, and she ended up in your body?" Liz questioned him further.

"Yeah, but she had to head back home, I told her it was fine." Eric explained, as he ran his manicured hand through his long hair. He knew that Liz was suspicious. Even in a 10 year old girl's body, her tone was unmistakable.

Steven meanwhile took a seat nearby the chatting couple, feeling a little out of place. He noticed Liz's two Weimaraner dogs pining at the closed kitchen door, but he remained silent. "So... who's in your body?" Eric suddenly asked Liz, gesturing over to Steven.

Steven cleared his throat, then answered Eric's question. "I'm Steven, I work at Wilkos." he said.

"Guy with the glasses, right?" Eric inquired.

"Well, not anymore, but yeah." Steven nodded as he sat back in his chair.

Eric then turned back to Liz with a puzzled look on his face. "And... why did you bring him home with you?" he asked her. It was a very good question, since Steven did have his own home to go to.

Liz thought about it, but couldn't come up with a good reason as to why she had dragged Steven all the way home with her. Other than she wanted to keep her eye on him. Liz suddenly realized that her former body belonged to Steven now, and it was his to do with as he pleased. "Um..." Liz began to say something, but then fell silent. It was Steven who spoke up again. "I just came to collect some of her clothes. You know... just incase this whole body swap thing is permanent." he explained.

Eric crossed his legs in a feminine manner, and nodded. "Oh, okay then." he muttered.

And that was when Liz turned her attention back to her swapped husband and his sexy new body. The chances of him being next to Helene by accident were pretty slim, she knew, since at the garage where Eric worked, Helene was the receptionist who never went near the cars. "So where were you then exactly when this thing happened?" she asked Eric.

"I can't remember exactly, we blacked out." Eric replied, even as he remembered the setting clearly. He was half naked in the office where Helene was when the Great Shift struck. But he wasn't about to reveal that to Liz and confirm her suspicions.

"I remember where I was stood." Liz said in her young voice.

Eric let out a frustrated sigh. "What's with the third degree honey? You think I wanted to be in this body?"

Steven could see where this conversation was going, and he got to his feet. "Um... can I just get some clothes and go home, please?" he asked Liz, who was still staring at her husband's svelte new body.

Liz hopped off her chair and led Steven into her and Eric's bedroom. She opened her wardrobe and gestured inside to her clothes and shoes. "Here, help yourself, and there's a suitcase under the bed. Tell me when you're ready to leave and I'll drive you home." she told Steven.

"Okay, thanks Liz." Steven smiled gratefully.

Liz then returned to the living room, and saw that Eric had switched the news on. The Great Shift had caused chaos across the planet, thousands of people were dead from automobile pile-ups, plane crashes, there was mass looting and riots.

Liz and Eric just watched in shock as the events unfolded on the television. "All those poor people..." Liz mumbled solemnly.

Suddenly their own predicament didn't seem quite as bad, all things considered.

And yet, Liz wasn't about to let Eric off the hook...
113122213211311121.title: Liz gets suspicious of Eric's new body

1131222132113111212.content:
"Look, it's been a great shock to both of us," Eric said trying to soothe his wife. "We are very lucky."

"I guess you are right. I must have been overreacting. I certainly didn't intend on being a little girl."

"You have always been my little girl. Come over here and give me some sugar." Liz had to stand on her tiptoes to reach the lips of her husband who had also shrunk down. But as she kissed him she sensed something familiar. It was Eric's cologne. In all the excitement, Eric forgot to wash up. Normally, Eric and Helene were careful. After their trysts they would wash up making sure that Helene's makeup and perfume wasn't on Eric and Eric's cologne wasn't on Helene. But because of the Great Shift they were just happy to get their clothes back on.

"YOU HAVE BEEN SEEING HER!!!" Liz shouted. The tone of her voice was two octaves higher than her usual voice now that she had the body of a little girl.

"WHAT???"

"If you hadn't then how come I can smell your cologne?!?"

"My cologne?"

"Yes, you know, I can smell it on you."

"Well, I guess when we fell during the shift we must have landed on each other."

"You are fucking lying to me!"

Eric was caught. There was no explanation for his cologne to be on Helene's body. They had been so careful, but who knew something like the Great Shift would happen. At the garage, they would have had plenty of time, but because of the Great Shift people were running around trying to figure out who was who so there wasn't time. It took forever just to get Helene's bra on himself even with Helene's help. Eric tried to make an excuse but it was no use.

"Look, I'm going to take Steven back home. When I get back, you had better not be here."

"Where should I go?"

"How about Helene's house. I don't fucking care. Just don't be here."

What happens next?
1131222132113111212.title: Liz accuses Eric of having an affair.

11312221321131112122.content:
Eric grabbed his van keys and sashayed out the door, walking very much like Helene used to. Liz glared at him as he passed her and then held her face in her hands once he had left the house. That was when Steven wandered back into the living room, suitcase in tow. When he saw Liz stood there alone crying, he knew something had gone off. He had also heard the raised voices.

"Where's Eric?" he asked Liz.

"Fucking gone! And good riddance to the cheating bastard." Liz responded. "He was having an affair with that slut he swapped with." Liz then explained, prompting Steven to realize how serious things were.

"Oh, I'm really sorry Liz." Steven said. He suddenly felt guilty about being in Liz's body, as though he was contributing to her suffering.

Liz looked over to Steven and saw him still dressed in her Wilkos uniform. "I thought you were getting changed." she said, changing the subject. She obviously didn't want to discuss what had just happened anymore.

"Er... I'm fine for now, at least I'm dressed." Steven shrugged his slender shoulders.

"Fair enough. You got enough clothes?" Liz inquired.

Steven nodded, and reached up to feel his ponytail. He still wasn't used to having long hair... amongst other things. "Yeah I think so, just some underwear, several pairs of jeans, trousers, some tops and some of your boots and trainers." he told her. "Oh, and your other work tops."

"Come on, I'll drive you home." Liz said, wiping a tear away.

Steven let out a sigh. "You don't have to you know, I can walk. You know... after what's happened."

"I'll take you." Liz said firmly. "I need to get out of this house for a while anyway."

"Okay, as long as you're sure." Steven mumbled, as he adjusted his bra strap, which was digging into his side.

"I am." Liz confirmed.
11312221321131112122.title: Eric leaves for ........

113122213211311121222.content:
"I think I had better drive," Steven said.

"No, I'll do it."

"I don't think you are in any shape physically or emotionally to drive. It would be better if I did it. At least I still have a license. I don't know what your legal status is."

Liz realized that he was right and gave Steven the keys. Steven readjusted the seat and took off. Liz told Steven what had happened exactly while they drove towards Steven's house. Steven took it all in. When they got there, Steven suggested that Liz come up stairs for a drink. Liz didn't know if she should, but Steven reassured her that nothing would happen. "How could it?" he quipped referring to the bodies they both inhabited.

They went into Steven's flat and Steven asked Liz what she wanted, there was beer, wine and soda. She could also have some tap water or tea or something but Steven didn't offer that. Liz wanted to have a beer and then it occurred to Steven that maybe Liz wasn't 'old' enough to have a beer. But Liz insisted and so Steven got one. They made small talk trying to avoid the many big problems that they now had.

After a while, Liz said she wanted to drive home, but Steven wouldn't let her. He didn't know how the beer would effect her much smaller body. "Besides," he said, "what do you have waiting for you at your house. Stay here."

"I don't have any clothes here."

"You don't have any clothes at your own house either. You can wear one of your own shirts. Use it like a nightshirt. We'll see about getting you some clothes tomorrow. I don't think we have work tomorrow anyway." Steven was right, who in their right mind would be going to their job in the morning. Well maybe the police and fire, but not ordinary store workers.

"You're right. Hey, then how will I buy some clothes for myself?"

"I don't know. Let's watch the teley and go to sleep and worry about tomorrow tomorrow." They changed into clothing that was more comfortable. Liz put on one of her old t-shirts and Steven wore a pair of Liz's pajamas. The usual broadcast channels had wall to wall Great Shift stories. Frankly, they got sick of being reminded how fucked they were so they decided to watch a DVD that Steven had instead. It wasn't very good but better than thinking about what had actually happened. They fell asleep in each other's arms.
113122213211311121222.title: Arriving at Steven's place.

11312222.content:
Steven, trying to maintain his balance with the outrageously different physique he now had, led Natalie to the tea room. He figured if the other employees were affected by this phenomenon--whatever it was--they would likely be gathered there. Sure enough, when the two of them burst through the door, they were met with more than a dozen startled reactions. A quick headcount from Natalie told Steven that besides the two of them, there were 14 other people in the room. That meant everyone on the evening team was accounted for, and the morning supervisor Donna--or at least her body--was there as well.

Luke, or whoever was in his body, piped up. "Um... Who are you two?"

"I'm Steven," Steven answered. "My body... well, it's Natalie's now."

"Oh, what a relief," Luke sighed. "It looks like none of us are strangers, then. Oh, I'm Rebekah, by the w--"

"Steven?!" Becky was interrupted by the sound of her own voice. Her body stood up and practically sprinted towards him. Gripping him in a surprisingly tight embrace, Becky's body revealed her identity. She was the real Liz. "Oh, thank God it was someone I can trust..." she wept, still clinging to her old body as Steven tried to wriggle out of her grasp.

"Liz, please let me go," he begged. She complied and the two of them began sharing everything they'd learned so far.

Natalie greeted the others, still mortified about the whole situation. Of course, it was only natural. She was worried for herself, but also for her fiancé. She wondered if he'd been affected as well, and if so, how would she find him?

The one who now inhabited Natalie's body was Mona, who was staying as calm as she could. She was thankful, at least, that she was still a woman.

Elizabeth, the manager, was seemingly unaffected by the mass body swap. Thus, she was the most organized and calm in the group. She came up with a simple idea: the employees were to exchange name tags, so that it would be much easier to remember who was who. When all was said and done, these were the results:

*The first person listed is the owner of the body, while the second is the body they now inhabit.

-Steven was in Liz's body.
-Liz was in Rebekah's body.
-Elizabeth was still herself.
-Andrea = Aaron.
-Natalie = Steven.
-Rebekah = Luke.
-Aaron = Mona.
-Helen = Becca.
-Becca = Laura.
-Tracey = Nicola.
-Nicola = Charlotte.
-Luke = Andrea.
-Laura = Donna.
-Mona = Natalie.
-Charlotte = Tracey.
-Donna = Helen.

"Now, we have a lot of customers here right now," Elizabeth began, quieting her workers down. "I'm sure they're all in as much of a panic as we are--probably even more--so we need a way to calm them all down."

"Yes, you're right," Rebekah agreed, still squirming about in Luke's body as she tried to get comfortable. "We should give an announcement over the PA and try to explain things."

"U-um..." Donna began. It was bizarre to see the ornery, selfish Donna act so timid. "I think we should tell the customers to file into your office, Elizabeth. We can get their information--real names, phone numbers, and stuff..."

"...and then they can exchange info, just like we did," Liz added. The employees all seemed to agree on the idea, so Elizabeth returned to her office as Steven, Liz, and Natalie went back to the shop floor to help herd customers in and calm them down.
11312222.title: ...most of the employees huddled together.

113122222.content:
As if dealing with their own situation wasn't bad enough, the employees were chagrined to find two female customers fighting on the shop floor. One was in her twenties and there was an older woman. They had obviously swapped with each other and the younger woman had accused the older one of stealing her body, thus starting a fight. "Ladies... please." Liz stepped forward, trying to seperate them. Once Natalie got involved the two combating women were finally parted. "Nobody stole anyone's body, nearly everyone has been swapped." Liz explained.

"But what's happening?? This can't be real." the younger woman cried from her now middle-aged body.

"It is real." Natalie chimed up. "And at least you're still a woman, be thankful okay." she grumbled, glancing down at herself.

Liz explained to the two women what was going to be happening, and then she made her way to the Help Desk and got on the tannoy, making the same anouncement to everyone in the shop. She was briefly distracted by the sight of a grown man's body sobbing in a corner. Even with her strong composure, Liz was having trouble taking all this in.

Once all the customers were lined up in front of the door leading upstairs, Andrea and Rebekah arrived on the shop floor to help keep order.

The rest of the staff meanwhile were sat in the tea room contemplating what came next. The most solemn of them was Luke, who now inhabited Andrea's 52-year old body.

"Right, you can go up ma'am." Steven mumbled to a female customer, wincing as he adjusted his bra strap, which was digging into him.

"I'm not a chick." the teenage boy inside the woman's body complained.

"Oh, sorry, just... head upstairs, turn right and follow the hallway." Steven apologized with a sigh. He was still not used to hearing Liz's voice coming from his mouth.

The swapped people disappeared upstairs one at a time, giving their personal details to Elizabeth. And when it was done, it was discovered most of the customers in the store had swapped with each other, but there were a few who had been outside when the Shift hit. Donna (in Helen's body) was stood behind Elizabeth the whole time taking notes. Although affected herself, Donna was at least almost the same age as she had been before. She knew many of her co-workers would have a whole lot more adjusting to do.

Liz meanwhile had retrieved her keys from Steven and had locked the doors to the store, so no looting could take place. As she jingled her keys in her hand, she took a deep breath and looked down at the teenage body she now inhabited. There were so many differences, she was a natural blonde now, she was slimmer, she had braces on her teeth and of course much smaller boobs. But she was thankful she was still a woman.

"So what do we do next?" Natalie asked Liz as she pushed her glasses up the bridge of her nose.

Liz just shrugged her new shoulders. "No idea." she mumbled. "I just hope Eric is okay." she sighed in despair.

"I know, I'm worried about Mike too." Natalie admitted, as a tear began trickling down her face. "What will he say when he sees me like this?" she wept, gesturing down to her male body.

Liz gave the taller Natalie a hug to try and comfort her, and even Andrea, in Aaron's body, approached to give her support. Though she refrained from hugging Natalie, the whole thing would have just felt and looked too weird.

Once all the customers had been 'processed' they came back down on the shop floor and waited, chatting uncomfortably to each other. Steven and Rebekah, their arms folded, just watched the odd assembly of people. Rebekah continued to squirm in Luke's lanky body, since she had an erection that refused to subside. Not that she was about to admit it to anyone.

"This is crazy!" Rebekah muttered, shaking her head.

Steven just nodded as he reached up to feel his ponytail. "Yep!" he stated simply.
113122222.title: Trouble on the shop floor.

choices: Re-calling her staff, one by one.
1132.content:
Elizabeth was unsure what to think as she paced back and forth, staring at her newest purchase. It was a piece of furniture she had bought for her office at work. It was a large teak cabinet that had come with a note inside one of the drawers. The note said;-

Thank you for buying our newest piece of furniture, 'The Enchanted Exchanger'. Simply place identical pieces of different people's clothing into the drawers and then hand them out at random. We promise the result will be life changing... in more ways than one. We hope you and your friends, whoever they may be, enjoy this wonderful purchase.

Elizabeth arched an eyebrow as she again re-read the note, to say she was skeptical would be an understatement. Nonetheless, the curious part of her wanted to see what her new cabinet was capable of. She thought who she could ask to participate in her little 'experiment', but she knew not many people would be willing to take off an item of their clothing for no apparent reason. Then she realized... she was the manager of a store and she had quite a few employees who would have to do what she told them or risk getting fired. A wicked little smile appeared on her face.

One by one she called her staff members into her office, starting with Liz, and Elizabeth decided to ask them all to remove their most intimate item of clothing... their knickers or briefs/boxer shorts and put them in the top drawer of the cabinet. Nearly all of them objected to it (but did so behind a screen), but Elizabeth exercised her authority as manager and they obeyed. Even the janitor Frank was asked to contribute his underwear for the cause, since there were a lot more women than there were men who worked in the store. A couple of them (Becca and Charlotte) were more curious than dismayed as to their boss's motives.

Once that was done, Elizabeth reached up her skirt and removed her own knickers, then she walked over to the cabinet and dropped them into the drawer, which she then closed. She was amazed when the whole cabinet seemed to glow for a moment, then returned to as it was before. "So... that's it?" Elizabeth asked herself, looking around expecting something huge to happen to her at any moment.

Shrugging, Elizabeth returned to her desk and sat down. She pretty much knew she now had to call her staff into the room again and tell them to pick a set of underwear out of the drawer at random and put them on, regardless who they belonged to. Elizabeth had to admit to herself that she was curious as to what would happen to her and her staff. "Maybe I should go first?" she smirked, as she opened the drawer full of now jumbled underwear a little, just enough to see inside of it. Her excitement level was peaked.
1132.title: The Enchanted Exchanger.

11322.content:
Charlotte was the first to be called in. "Ok Charlotte you can pick up your panties." Elizabeth said as the young girl entered the room.

"Panties?" Charlotte laughed. "Nice one, but I think I'll just stick with these." she said pulling out Franks nasty briefs. She pulled them up tight and strutted out the door.

"Interesting....." Elizabeth said.
11322.title: Re-calling her staff, one by one.

choices: You will do as you are told and like it!
113221.content:
"Todd, please come in" Elizabeth said. Todd Softly entered the room and stood before his boss. He wasn't a true employee just a son of a friend who needed some extra cash. Elizabeth had unofficialy given him the title of "Goffer" and did odd and simple tasks around the shop. She looked and the attractive teen with intrude and anticipation. "Todd please pick up your boxers and exit the room" Elizabeth commanded.

"Excuse me?" Todd said with a meek tone. He stared at his both with a worried look. Elizabeth smiled as she pointed to her cabinet of underpants.

"You heard me, please pick up your things and exit my office." she teased. Todd approached the cabinet and begin to feel around.

"Why would you want to wear someone's boxers" he asked after pulling out Mona"s high cut beige panties. They were for a mature woman but still had nylon floral print to show off a femine side. Todd walked behind the private screen in his boss's office and begin to undress. As he did Elizabeth began asking questions.

"Don't you find it odd Todd that you are wearing women's panties? A young man like yourself surely can't be seen in those." she laughed and Todd stepped out from behind the screen. He pulled up his jeans and zipped them up giving Elizabeth the slightest view of his new look.

Todd just looked at her and side, "This is all very odd Elizabeth, please don't ask me to do this again."
113221.title: Next victim.

1133.content: How about the alien entity known as the Role Exchanger? It could pay Wilkinson a visit and experiment with its employees and the other residents of the town as part of its 'task' of studying humans. Everyone would of course be aware of the swaps that occur and have to adapt after having their physical traits etc. swapped.
1133.title: The Role Exchanger.

11331.content:
Unknown to the employees of Wilkinson and the few customers who were in the store at 4:30pm in the afternoon had no idea they were being observed by a unique extra terrestrial intelligence with the power to manipulate organic matter. The ability to exchange people's physical and mental traits, which is where it got its name from. There were other parts of the world that had already been visited by this alien being, and now it was in England, selecting the people who worked in an otherwise ordinary store in a quiet, 'multicultural' town as its targets.

"Please tell me we've taken more money than yesterday Donna!" Liz muttered to one of the day staff as she approached the Help Desk. She knew the shop hadn't been meeting its budget lately, and was eager for it to do so.

"A little more yeah" Donna replied, having worked out the sums. Donna was excellent at maths, and had been all her life. At 43 years old she had worked at Wilkinson for the past 12 years, a couple more years than Liz. The mature woman was wearing her red 'Wilko' blouse, a pair of black, boot-cut trousers and a pair of size 5 (UK) black patent pumps. Liz had on near identical clothes except her footwear was size 7 (UK) flat black shoes with laces.

"Oh that's a relief!" Liz sighed, as she put her hands on her hips and looked around. There were quite a few customers around, as well as the women sat at the cashpoints scanning their items through the tills. And of course all the usual members of the Evening team were in work, having started early.

The blueish haze that was the Role Exchanger hovered nearby, observing everyone and waiting to make its move.

But how would it start swapping people's traits around??
11331.title: Sounds great.

113311.content:
Joyce Chiasson an American tourist walked out of her taxi in a foul mood. She was visiting her English aunt and was informed that the room she would be staying in would have no lights. What made Joyce so mad was her incompetent cousin who lives with her aunt. During the weekly shopping trip the cousin forgot light bulbs.

"Just what I need to be doing on my my vacation", Joyce grumbled, as she headed toward the front of the English store that she had never heard of before. Unbeknownst to Joyce the role exchanger was waiting for her and the employees of the store.

Joyce trucked down to the lighting section. The lady was dressed in a black skirt and red pumps. She was wearing a sleeveless red blouse which matched her shoes, she also was carrying a black coach purse. She stood about 5'3 and had very pert c-cup breast. Joyce prided herself on being a lady and it showed in her mannerisms and dress. But she was not a frail type, she stood her ground when needed.

As she made her down the aisle, her shoes clicking, she spotted a young man on the aisle who looked like an employee. He towered over Joyce and she placed his height at about six foot or so. He was wearing glasses and seemed handsome from Joyce's perspective.

"Excuse me young man could you help me?" Steven turned and faced the customer and smiled. "Yes ma'am, what do you need?" At this point the role swapper appeared. There was a bright light and time seemed to stop for the briefest period.Joyce and Steven both blinked their eyes. They were both wearing what they normally would. Joyce was in her skirt and Steven in his work clothes. But the conversation became different.

"I am staying with my aunt and my lazy cousin forgot to buy light bulbs for my room. Can you imagine." Steven said. What was amazing was his accent was gone. replaced with the Texas "twang" Joyce used to have.He still had his voice just the accent was different."I need to find light bulbs so I can do some reading tonight." Steven continued as Joyce handed him her purse. Steven put it on his shoulders.

Then Joyce spoke," Yes sir just follow me. We carry a wide assortment of bulls." With that Joyce turned on her red heels and led Steven to the lightbulb section of the aisle. Steven the picked a few bulbs and headed to the checkout counter. Meanwhile, Joyce went back to doing Steven's job.
113311.title: Subtly at first.

11332.content:
How about one of the female employees gains the ability to absorb and transfer traits, but only from other women? The body parts can either be traded for their own or added to their own (depending on the trait). The other women may or may not be aware of the swaps/changes. This sound good??

If it does, then which staff member gets the power?
11332.title: Absorb & Transfer.

11333.content: Maybe something is introduced or happens that switches the lives and clothes of some (or all) of the protagonists, but they keep their own bodies? This idea hasn't been explored nearly enough and might be a lot of fun. How does that sound?
11333.title: The Life Swapper.

113331.content:
Steven stood and stared, scratching his head. There was a new display stand in Wilkinson's, front and center, right besides the sliding doors. It was big and bright and bolted to the floor. There were blinking christmas lights all over it. On the stand, seated in a velvet purple cushion, was a rudimentary plastic toy rifle that resembled a nerf gun.

Get a life with the all new Life Swapper! Only from Bandai,, the flashing neon sign on the front of the display stand announced.

There had been no mention of the product's arrival in the last team meeting. Stranger still, Steven was quite sure the stand hadn't been there when he passed five minutes earlier.

He lifted the display model from it's cushion, finding it as light and tacky as he expected. As he pressed his finger to the trigger, a sight clicked up on the top. Holding it to his eye, he was surprised to see that the customers around him were picked out with a golden halo when viewed through the clear plastic viewfinder.

He pointed it _____ and squeezed the trigger.
113331.title: Lets roll with it.

choices: Best to come clean to everyone
1133311.content:
Steven figured he must have come across some toy, so he thought he'd go ahead and try to be the first person to get a high score, so he aimed at one of the customers and..."Steven! Stop playing with that!" A loud voice called out behind Steven. He was so freaked out by it he instinctively squeezed the trigger as he turned around to come face to face with the beautiful Liz.

There was no smoke, lasers, sound effects or anything special once the Life Swapper was fired at Liz, but Steven felt like something was off. It took both Steven a Liz a beat to figure out what had changed but Liz's eyes went wide as she attempted to discreetly grab her chest. Steven's eyes followed Liz's hands inadvertently as he noticed that Liz was no longer wearing a bra. And an itchy feeling on his chest made Steven realize it was now wrapped around his chest. As soon as Steven figured out this Life Swapper thing wasn't some cheap looking game, he noticed a few other subtle changes. Steven found that he was now wearing Liz's makeup and earrings as well as her pantyhose. And Steven would bet that if he went to the bathroom to check it out he'd have on Liz's panties under the regulation uniform. Angerly Liz took the gun from Steven's hand and whispered angerly as not to attract too much attention, "Damn it Steven, this was a big prototype that we're demonstrating for the customers. Not for employees to use."

"I'm sorry, my bad. I don't remember this being mentioned in the last team meeting so I thought it'd be okay to look at. Just zap us back and nobody will have to know."

Liz sighed, "I'm afraid we can't do that Steven. This is just the demo and only has one Life Swap in it per day."

"Wait, so, we're stuck living each others life?"

"Just for a day. It's a stupid annoyance, but it's no big deal. I'll go ahead and tell Elizabeth what happened, and I should probably call my husband."

"No wait!" Steven said stopping Liz before she could leave, "I can't get in trouble with Elizabeth for something like this. Can we please try to keep this a secret? It's only one day and I will owe you big time."

Liz thought about it with the Life Swapper in hand before making her decision.
1133311.title: Steven zaps a co-worker

choices: Follow Liz as she experiences single male life
11333112.content:
Liz gave a very heavy sigh as she said, "Fine, but you owe me very big for this one Steven."

"Thanks so much, I will never forget this."

"And I won't let you. Now I have a few ground rules." Liz said more stern than she'd ever sounded on the job, "1. While at work avoid speaking to anyone, someone comes to you with a conflict, divert it to me if it's minor or Elizabeth if it's major. And most importantly 2, when you go to my home I do not want to find a single thing out of place, especially in my bedroom in my drawers. Do you get my drift?"

Steven gulped, "Yes mam."

"Good, now let's get back to work." Liz said as she went to the back room to do some of the more heavy lifting that Steven would normally do. Steven meanwhile had the kind of cushy, yet much more boring job of supervising. Steven stood over people shoulders making sure they didn't screw up. And Steven even got to order a few people around who had gotten on his nerves at different times in the past. A few times Steven participated in some 'girl talk' that some of the girls at work tried to get him to participate in, however he always pretended that he had to leave to do supervisor things if the conversations got to much into Liz's personal life or something uncomfortable.

All in all Steven liked the different change of pace of work, but was ready to get back to doing his normal stuff tomorrow.


Liz on the other hand was pretty much completely miserable. Even though she had Steven life and job, she still had her kind of weak body and she was expected to do all of the heavy lifting Steven normally did. At first she asked for help from Aaron, but he started mocking her for needing the help and soon her pride took over and she was doing everything on her own despite not always being the wisest decision. It was a day of hard labor and sweat but it was finally. "I am really going to get Steven back for this one day." Liz said smelly and out of breath as she got in Steven's car and headed to his place.
11333112.title: Keep the swap a secret

choices: They have a special evening planned at home
113331121.content:
Steven had only been around Liz's place once for a big party she'd thrown with her husband Eric, but he must have had a really good memory about where it was because he was able to get to her home no problem. Along the way as he looked in the rear view mirror and was a bit surprised to see Liz's face staring back at him. He almost swerved off the road in surprise (resulting in getting a middle finger and a shout of 'fucking women drivers' from some ass). He looked behind him to make sure Liz didn't sneak into the car when he wasn't looking, but no. It turns out that swapping Liz's life including getting her reflection. "So this is how the world sees me now, I know it's not exactly a stranger's face looking back at me, but it's still weird." Steven said to himself. Finally he pulled into Liz's garage and groaned when he saw that Eric was already home probably waiting on his wife.

Everything seemed to turn out fine with the device. What had happened to Carly's husband was as good as she could have wanted. To make it happen she had selected several options, homosexual, submissive, crossdressing, and a few other options. Andrea was happy that Carly was single again.

Now that she had made changes and saw that they came as she expected, Andrea could change herself and expect it to come out as she wanted. Besides on the top of the device were two big buttons. The device was well thought out and on the top were the buttons that would be of most use. The first was the undo button. This option would undo the changes of the last few people who had been changed. You didn't have to undo the changes of the last person only, you could undo the changes of the last 5 people. You pick the big undo changes button and then a list of the last few people who were changed and you could select whomever you wanted to. The next button was duplicate changes. This is a common button. Just like when you ordered a pizza you might have a list of toppings that you particularly liked. It was the same with the device. If you wanted three things to happen to one person, then you could select another person and have those same three changes happen to them. These were the two biggest buttons on the main menu screen of the device.

Since Andrea knew she could undo any change she made, Andrea was brave enough to try the age regression option on herself. Andrea decided to make herself twenty-three years old. Andrea was going to have a fun night out and then return to normal. Twenty-three might be fun, but Andrea really wasn't a kid and didn't want to be one. Andrea picked the setting she wanted and selected herself and engaged the device.

Suddenly Andrea wasn't sitting in the passenger seat, she was in the drivers seat of the car. The device did the best it could to make the new reality as plausible as the old reality. For Andrea to be twenty-three her daughter, Carly had to be two years old. Since two-year-olds can't drive, the device put the new younger Andrea in the driver's seat and Carly was put in a baby seat in the back.

Andrea heard Carly yammering. She turned to see Carly in the back of the car in her baby seat. In Carly's hand was the device. Since Andrea was driving she couldn't be playing with the device, there are laws about 'texting' and driving, let alone about changing reality and driving so the device put itself into Carly's hand.

Carly was now a normal two year old and so she did what any two-year-old would do when something interesting was placed before her. She started hitting it with her fingers. (Pressing controls was what she was actually doing, but that was mostly the result of her action then her intent.) Seeing the device in her hand, Andrea reached for it. She wasn't looking at the road and when the device activated Andrea was having an accident.

Andrea woke up in a hospital bed. She was bandaged and she hurt all over. She had several broken bones and cuts, but she would recover.

"Oh, you are up," a cheerful nurse stated. "Do you know what happened?"

"I think I was in a car accident."

"Yes, you were seriously hurt, but you will be just fine."

Relieved Andrea asked, "How is Carly?"

"The baby is just fine, your girlfriend picked her up."

"My girlfriend?"

"Yes. She is very worried about you. I'll go get her."

When the nurse left the room, Andrea tried to figure out what had happened. She remembered the device and making herself younger. She remembered all of a sudden driving and looking back to see Carly who had to be only about two or three years old in a car seat playing with the device. That is all she remembered although she knew she must have been in an accident. What did the nurse mean about her girlfriend. She was a married woman. She remembered her entire old life.

What Andrea didn't know was that while playing with the device, Carly had hit the duplicate changes button and had selected the changes done to 'Simone'. Andrea now had all the changes she had wished upon Simone. She was now a homosexual. She was now extremely submissive. She was now a cross-dresser (she would only wear masculine clothing even though she was the submissive person in the relationship.) She was now very concerned with her appearance and she would now spend hours working out in the gym. This is why her wounds were not as serious as they could be, she now had the physique of a female body builder. On the other hand she didn't have to work anymore but she was obsessive about keeping a clean house.

But even though she knew how it used to be, like Simone this is the new her and she had to live her new life regardless of how she remembered her old life. There was one hope, the device could fix things. But she didn't know where it was.

He sat at the bench grumbling about work when he saw something across the street at the thrift store. It was a flicker of green light. He knew his bus was going to be coming soon but found himself very curious of what the light was. He took a small risk and walked over to the thrift store, the rain had picked up. After the hike across the street he looked at the front of the store and didn't see anything that resembled the green light he saw earlier. Then he saw the bin, it was full of junk. Although there was a canopy to the shop front most of the items had gotten wet on account of the rainy day. Steven felt annoyed that he had walked across the street and was about to leave when he saw peeking from the back of the plastic bin was something that looked brass and had a flicker of green light.

He pulled out a short blade with a brass hilt and matching sheath. It felt slightly heavy but couldn't have been linger that 35 cm. It looked cool to Steven but felt out of place considering the bin he had found it. The bin was marked for items at 50 pence. He decided to pull it out of its sheath and for a second he thought he saw a green reflection on the blade itself. He thought he was seeing things. It was at this moment Steven decided he was taking the blade home, he didn't have good reason to own something like this something that could lead to trouble in England. He decided despite the risk he wanted it and walked into the thrift store. Inside the store there was more junk covered in dust, there was a pile of newspapers about to fall over on the counter. Steven looked around for a shopkeeper. But found no one. He did see on the counter a sign that was written in pencil.

"Out to lunch, if you want an item leave some money in the jar. Make change if you need it. Have a nice day!'

Steven kept the blade hidden in his bag not wanting to pull it out on the bus. He kept opening his bag and looking inside at the brass handle.

The bus stopped outside of Wilkinson's and Steven walked in. He needed to show this blade to someone. He thought about showing Natalie who had recently been more talkative than usual to him. However he didn't want the blade to be out in the open so he locked the blade up in his locker for the time being, not the best move but he didn't want it to fall in the wrong hands, or worse get it take away from him.

He worked his shift and moved the boxes that Liz told him to move and put some things on the palettes in the back. He swept up the back and then saw Natalie punch in a time card to go on break. He had not talked to her all day, but this would be a perfect time to show her the blade. He walked over to the locker and unlocked it.
114122112211.title: No, he heads to work.

1141221122111.content:
Steven grabbed the blade in its bag and walked over to the tea room where Natalie was at. He told himself to not appear to anxious or creepy.

He walked in and saw Natalie in the room with a tv dinner reading a magazine. She had just recently got back from a meeting with Elizabeth and some corporate types about workplace safety and she was selected to be the employee advocate. She was dressed nicer than usual and instead of her wearing the regular red polo and black pants was wearing something more professional.

She was wearing a gray pencil skirt and with black hose and black wedge shoes with a small heel. She was also wearing a red blouse and had her hair up. She was wearing make up and jewelry. Steven immediately noticed Natalie's outfit. Steven excitedly sat next to her without asking.

He immediately wanted to show the blade to Natalie but wasn't sure how to do it. He wondered should he demonstrate it on himself or on her.
1141221122111.title: And grabbed it

11412211221111.content:
"Hey Natalie!" Steven greeted his co-worker, who took another mouthful of her TV dinner and looked up from her magazine momentarily. "Hmm?" she mumbled, wondering what Steven wanted. "Watch this!" Steven grinned, wielding the blade in his hand.

Natalie just frowned, then looked towards the door briefly. "You're not supposed to have illegal knives on the premises, you know that. We have safety knives" she said.

"This isn't 'just' a knife Natalie" Steven grinned. "By the way... you look nice!"

Natalie smirked and looked down at herself. "Thanks! But I don't feel as comfortable believe me" she shrugged.

There were no further words exchanged, and Natalie watched in horror as Steven brought the blde down... severing his own right hand at the wrist. Natalie spat out the food she had in her mouth and pushed her chair away from the table, scraping the ground with the chair legs. "OH MY GOD!" she exclaimed. After a minute's panicking however, she noticed there was no blood, and Steven was still smiling.

"What the... fuck?" Natalie grimaced.

"I know... right!" Steven chuckled, inspecting his stump. He then used his left hand to push his severed right one towards Natalie, who backed off further.
11412211221111.title: On himself.

Steven still looking for approval looked nervous, this was not going how he had hoped. He was about to say something to calm her down. When Natalie bolted up and started to walk away, her first thought was to tell Elizabeth or Liz or someone!

Steven was shocked and blurted out "Natalie wait!!" But she was already out of the chair and trying to stand up. Steven didn't want this to go badly and started to panic. He blurted out "WAIT NATALIE!" which to she replied "Get away freak!"

Steven panicked and got up and moved after Natalie, he still had the blade in his hand. This scared her further. Then....

1141221122111112.content:
Steven was in a panic, if Natalie just left the room, she could tell the world about the knife and he could get into very big trouble. Almost without control of his body, Steven runs up to natalie and while swinging his arms, with knife in hand, shouts, "NO!" Steven's arm swings wildly and as Natalie turns to Steven, the knife in Steven hand goes across her neck. Steven and Natalie both looked to shocked to even scream as Natalie's head neatly slides off her head and slams into the hardwood floor.

It took everything in Steven not to freak out. As calmly as he could he dropped the knife and picked up Natalie's head and whispered, "Are you okay?" But Natalie didn't respond. Oh God, I've killed her! Steven thought as he neared tears, but before he broke down he felt Natalie's breath on his face. "Oh, thank goodness you're okay, okay. It looks like you've got a bump on your head and knocked yourself out. But it'll be okay, I can just reattach your head, no problem." Steven said this as he started to try to reattach Natalie's head with shaky hands, but before he could, there was a knock on the door.

"Steven? Is everything okay in there? I thought I heard you shout?" Steven almost caused Natalie's head to bounce off the floor a second time as he heard his co-worker Andrea's voice come through the door. "It's nothing, I just...I dropped something. Some tea! Yeah, don't come in, it's a mess. I'm cleaning it!"

"Well, alright, I was just checking. I'll see you when you finish up in there." Steven breathed a sigh of relief that Andrea didn't come in the room. Steven quickly locked the door and realized he had a decision to make. He'd just lied about Natalie and he saw two options. He could simply reattach Natalie's head, say she knocked herself out and when she wakes up hope that she'd either forgotten or has calmed down. Or he could hide Natalie's head in a bag, run it to his car, and hide her body somewhere.

11412211221111122.content:
I can't just reattach Natalie and hope that she either won't tell or won't come after me. I've to play this safe, but how? Steven thought to himself and as he was thinking his eyes came across an empty cardboard box that was about to be thrown out. "I wonder..." So Steven took Natalie's bodiless head and gently put it into the box and also put in some paper towels in for cushion. "Now what do I do with you?" Steven said as he looked at Natalie's body laying on the ground. It was then the lightbulb went off in Steven's mind. "Of course!" He made his way to the window and opened it. Directly below was a full dumpster. "Perfect, I can drop the body off their and the garbage man doesn't come for two days so I've got plenty of time to retrieve it tomorrow while I take Natalie to my place and reason with her. Yeah, that'll work."

The plan seemed perfect to Steven in that moment, but then again any plan would probably seem that way in a time of panic. So Steven picked up Natalie's body and, after making sure nobody was looking, Steven gently pushed the limp body out of the window. Steven heard the crashing thud, but chose to shrug it off. He then picked up the box with the head in it. Took a deep breath. And as casually as he could during the circumstances. He left quickly only stopping to tell Liz that he needed to make a quick delivery and bolted.

When he got back to his home, Steven could hear a rustling in the box. He quickly ran the box inside just in time for a tirade of swearing and hysteria directed towards him. After hours and hours of talking and screaming and fighting over the fact that she didn't have a body, Natalie seemed to have calmed down a little bit. Steven wasn't sure if it was because she really understood his situation and would work with him, or if she realized she didn't have much of a choice and would call the cops the second she got the chance. But he didn't really want to worry about it, he just wanted to not worry so much about it all. So he microwaved up some nachos and set Natalie on the couch beside him. She didn't seem happy about it, but she did let him feed her a few bites even though she wasn't hungry without her stomach in site.

Steven tried to make small talk with Natalie, but it was just as awkward as one would imagine. So he just turned on the tv.

Steven's eyes opened in shock as when he opened the door he saw the garbage stained body of Natalie standing in front of him. He was so frozen in shock he didn't even notice the lead pipe that suddenly swung at his head knocking him out.

____________________________________

Steven awoke to a splitting headache and an echoing singing of Natalie in the distance. Steven went to feel what was sure to be a bump on his head when he realized he couldn't feel his arm, in fact he couldn't feel his body at all. Maybe it was because he'd already decapitated his co-worker earlier that day, but he was calm about this situation. First things first he knew he had to figure out where he was, judging by the pictures on the wall and the voice he could hear coming from the bathroom he knew that this had to be Natalie's bedroom. He then tried to look down, and with his peripheral vision he was able to tell that where once he had a body he now had a clay pot that Steven actually recognized from his place. Then out of the corner of his eye, just about a foot away he saw the blade standing upright on the dresser he was on.

Figuring he'd done all he could just sitting there, Steven looked at the blade and tried to make his way to it. With as much momentum as a head in a pot could muster, Steven scooted the pot towards the blade a little bit at a time. But just before the knife was in reaching distance of his mouth, the door opened and Natalie entered the room wrapped up in a towel. Steven's eyes opened wide in fear not knowing how Natalie would react.

"Yeah, sure." Steven said kind of sadly as he tried to make himself comfortable with his pot. After about an hour of unsuccessful sleep attempts, Steven saw Natalie get out of bed and looked at Steven.

"I can tell you can't sleep and I'm sorry about that. If I let you sleep in bed with me do you think you could get some shut eye?"

"Sleeping in a bed would be better than this, but would you really sleep with a head in a pot."

In fact, it's magic! I can cut off any part I want with it, and still be perfectly fine. I can still control the detached parts too, just watch." Having said that, Steven begins to concentrate on his severed hand, willing it to run across the table towards Natalie. Despite what she'd just been told, and what she'd already witnessed with her own eyes, Natalie wasn't at all prepared for this, and jumped up out of her chair, letting out a little squeal of fright, causing Steven to laugh even harder.

"What are you so worried about Natalie? You act as though you've never seen a living disembodied hand before!" Steven said, scooping up his severed hand and reattaching it to his wrist.

"Your serious aren't you?" Natalie asked, still not quite believing the evidence of her own senses.

"Completely serious." Steven answered, attempting to look as earnest as possible in order to get Natalie to believe him.

It must have worked, because slowly, cautiously, Natalie began to reach for the knife, just barely touching it, then quickly drawing back, as though she'd expected to be bitten or something. Nothing happened however, and after a moment spent gathering her courage, Natalie reached for the knife again, quicker and more certain this time. Just as she wrapped her hand around the hilt however, Steven stops her, placing his other hand over her own, causing Natalie to give him a puzzled, and somewhat fearful look.

"It'll have to do, for now at least." Steven answered, letting go of Natalie's hand, leaving her with full control of the magic knife.

Liz nodded. "Yeah, and I have this weird taste in my mouth." She said, looking around in a distracted manner.

"Same." Steven said. Little did the two of them know, that an alien entity had crept into the building with the intent of experimenting on the population inside. For reasons unknown, the alien had decided to use Steven as his primary test subject, and was preparing to begin its first experiment.

"I feel really weird Steven." Said Liz, fear creeping into her voice. Steven felt compelled to look around, but nothing out of the ordinary. A sudden wave of nausea hit Steven and his vision blurred momentarily. Liz let out a little yelp and he heard her fall backwards.

"Liz, are you OK?!" Steven said urgently.

"What?!" She said with alarm from the ground. "This can't be happening, this isn't possib-" Liz shrieked, before stopping mid sentence.

"Liz, Liz!" Steven shouted, his vision clearing. He looked over the counter to see Liz's form laying on the ground. Steven followed her up from her work shoes, up her legs and thick thighs. His gaze lingered on her bosom, and finally rested on her head. Or rather, his head. His eyes widened in panic, as he beheld his own visage, apparently unconscious, on the busty body of Liz!"

"There is no way." Steven said, backing away in horror. "I must be dreaming!" Steven slapped himself. "Bloody hell!" He slapped himself again. "Damnit all!" Steven knew he wasn't dreaming, so he walked back towards the counter and looked once again down at 'Liz'. She was passed out, from shock most like. He was barely holding it together, after all, the same face that Steven had beheld in the mirror every day of his life was on the body of Liz, a woman he had worked with for years. Just then, he noticed Elizabeth walking up.

"Steven!" She said. "What is all the commotion!"
1143311.title: Steven gets the power.

11433111.content:
Steven expected his manager to freak out even more than he had at the sight of his head atop Liz’s unconscious body. But she didn’t, she was however concerned. “Oh my god, what’s happened?” she asked Steven, rushing behind the Help Desk to help Liz.

“Um…I don’t know!” Steven shrugged. And he was telling the truth.

“Liz, wake up love! Elizabeth said as she gently slapped her cheeks. Steven for his part just stood there staring down at the two of them. “Steven, will you go upstairs and fetch me a glass of water please” Elizabeth said, turning to him.

“Uh...yeah, sure!” he nodded, doing as requested.

On his way upstairs, he kept mumbling to himself, shaking his head. What the hell had happened to Liz?? Where had her head gone?” Would she be aware of what had happened when she came around? The questions raced through Steven’s mind as he hurried into the tea room, retrieved a glass from the cupboard and filled it with water.

As he descended the stairs, he wasn’t aware that the ‘entity’ that had caused Liz’s change had been following him, studying his reaction to its handiwork.

“Here’s the water!” Steven said to Elizabeth, leaning over the Help Desk to pass the glass to her. Steven then looked around at the small crowd that had gathered around, his friends Becky, Andrea, Laura and Helen. He heard them gossiping amongst themselves, wondering what had transpired with poor Liz. Steven just wished he could have told them what had occurred, but he had no idea himself.

Peering down once again at Liz’s unconscious body, he couldn’t believe there was an exact copy of his noggin affixed to it.

Just then, Liz began to wake up. “Easy Liz, you must have fainted sweetie” Elizabeth mumbled, resting her hand on Liz’s shoulder.

“Oh wow, what the hell was that?” Liz groaned in her now deep voice, as she straightened her glasses on her face.

Steven just held his breath as Liz sat up.

114331112.content:
"Are you going to be alright, Liz, do I need to call your husband?" Asked Elizabeth with worry in her voice.

Liz looked at Elizabeth like she was crazy, Steven's own confused head was planted right on top of a woman's body, and Steven seemed to be the only one to notice. "This isn't right." Said Liz.

"I think maybe we should take you to the hospital, love." Said Elizabeth, authority in her voice. Liz looked around, the copies of Steven's eyes were disoriented. Finally, Steven's own eyes met the ones Liz now sported. Her mouth hung open. She raised her hand and pointed up at him,

"Me." She said. "That is supposed to be me." Her voice was full of fear, and he was starting to know why. Why's she have just my head, and not my brain too? That's not Liz, that's me! Thought Steven, his mind racing.

"Maybe I should take her." Said Steven, thinking quickly. Liz was still staring at him, her arm shaking as it lowered slowly.

Elizabeth looked up at you. "Are you sure Steven?"

"Yeah, I'll call her husband on the way there, and I'll check in once she's admitted," Steven said. He grabbed Liz by the wrist and pulled her up.

"Careful, Steven!" Said Elizabeth shrilly.

"Not Liz!!" She mumbled. "I'm not a woman." The other employees watched as he pulled Liz out of the store. He didn't know where he was going, but he had some questions for 'Liz'.

1143311122.title: Let's talk

114332.content:
"So why are we doing this again?" Steven, 34, asked as he and his three friends walked into the mall.

"What... you mean interracting outside of work? Yeah I can see how that might be difficult for you Steven!" Liz, 31, his supervisor from Wilkinson replied acerbically. "Actually I thought you'd appreciate a day out instead of stuck in your apartment all day alone" she then told him.

"Sounds good to me!" Natalie, 27, chimed in with her two cents worth.

Becky, 18, remained silent while the little discussion was happening. But she also thought it was good for Steven to be socializing for a change. She wasn't sure that a day's shopping was exactly what Steven had in mind however.

Liz's 5' 4" figure was dressed in her usual style of clothing, namely a pair of hip hugger jeans (that created a slight muffin top), a pair of grey sneaker flats with velcro straps and a knitted grey sweater with the sleeves rolled up. Even under her sweater her large 30H breasts were prominent. Her dyed, straight blonde hair, which she usually wore up in a ponytail for work, was down around her shoulders. She twiddled with her wedding ring as she led her 'group' into the mall.

6' tall Steven was casually dressed in 'drab' clothes, namely a black t-shirt, a faux leather jacket, stonewash jeans and a pair of khaki hiking boots. His head was closely shaved and his silver designer glasses gave him a slight 'nerdish' look.

Natalie was 5' 6" and she always took great care in how she dressed outside of work hours, and today she looked 'sassy' in a red halter top, a pair of white capri pants and some two-toned (black & white) ballet flats. Her large B-cup breasts were a nice 'handful', or so her fiance Mike thought.

The youngest of the group, Becky still had braces on her teeth, and with her long blonde hair up in a high ponytail she looked downright cute. Her choice of clothing on this day was a white, short-sleeve t-shirt, tight black leggings and a pair of plain black flats. Her breasts were a B-cup but were smaller than Natalie's.

"You gonna stay outside while we're looking for clothes?" Liz inquired of Steven, smirking as she gestured to a shop to their right.

"Might as well come in with you, but don't expect me to give any opinions. And for god's sake do NOT ask me if you look fat in anything!" Steven grumbled, looking at all three of his friends, then glancing around at the other people in their vicinity. Out of the corner of his eye, Steven thought he saw something hovering up int he air, but when he looked again there was nothing. "Hmph!" he muttered, shrugging his shoulders and passing it off as his mind playing tricks on him.

"Alright, come on!" Liz said, leading them into the store.

The mysterious blue light Steven had caught a glimpse of seconds ago, followed them inside... observing.
114332.title: The Role Exchanger.

115.content:
Just throwing another option out there. A mad scientist, always a popular choice. The hapless workers at Wilkinson (and maybe some other people) become the playthings of an eccentric but brilliant scientist who has questionable ethics to say the least. He could either turn the store into his own laboratory somehow or lure some of the characters somewhere else and capture them for use in his experiments.

The name of the scientist and the location is up to you. Does this sounds interesting enough, or should we try something else?
115.title: Okay, another story idea.

1151.content:
“Bwahahahahahahah!” A loud cackle resounded off the wall of the laboratory. “It’s mine, it’s finally all mine.”

Dr. Seymour basked in the awe of the mess of metal and wires before him. Finally, after so many hard years, so many years of failure, so many years of the science community laughing him down, he finally had it.

“Bwahahahahahaha! I am a genius, may the world bow down before the Great Dr. Seymour!”

He stopped his rant for a moment, if only to bask in the moment.

He sighed, “It just isn’t fun when there is no audience.” He muttered.

A door to the lab burst open and a tall, busty blonde female who also sported a lab coat rushed in.

“Doctor, Doctor, I-” She stopped when she saw the machine. “Um, what is this?”

“Ah, greetings Disciple #1.” Dr. Seymour. “Behold, my new invention. It’s the Equanaminizer 200001.”

Disciple #1 blinked, “So, what does it do?”

Dr. Seymour raised his arms, as if to give another over the top speech, but then suddenly deflated.

“Uh, actually, I have no idea.” He replied rather sheepishly.

“You don’t know? Then why-”

She was cut off as Dr. Seymour gave a maniacal grin, “That’s the fun! I will find what it does! All I have to do is pull that lever over there!”

Seymour pointed at a red strip of metal that stood out of the pile of machinery that was his invention.

“Or was it that blue button… I don’t remember.”

“Wait, you’re just going to test it, with what? Don’t you remember what happened last time?” Disciple #1's voice quavered between disapproval and fear as her hands covered her crotch, almost defensively.

“Ha ha ha!” Dr. Seymour laughed. Disciple #1 knew this laugh well. This was not the egotistical rant laugh, this was the Doctor planning generic and stereotypical evil type laugh.

“Why, with test subjects of course!” A hungry gleam filled his eyes
1151.title: Hmm, maybe.

11511.content:
"And just where are you expecting to find test subjects at this time of day Doctor?" Disciple #1 inquired of him as she looked at the clock on the wall. It was just after 7:00pm in the evening and it was already going dark. "There isn't exactly a dance hall or music festival nearby, and the park is hardly going to be populated at this hour." she continued.

"Well I... there must be some people, somewhere, surely?" Dr. Seymour responded, sounding desperately hopeful.

Disciple #1 folded her arms and raised an eyebrow. A glance to the control panel nearby, or more precisely the bolts holding it together, gave her an idea. "Hmm, maybe that store, Wilko, where you got all your tools and bolts from maybe? I know it has a team working the late shift every evening. And its just far enough away from the town center that nobody will notice they're gone for some time."

"Ah wonderful idea, but er... how do we get them here?" the Doctor then asked his assistant.

"Really? Must I think of everything?" Disciple #1 sighed, letting her arms drop by her sides. "You're the one with the brilliant mind Doctor, surely you can think of some way to transfer the test subjects here." she grumbled.

Dr. Seymour just thought for a moment, then sighed.

"I'll make the arrangements Doctor." Disciple #1 said quietly, rolling her eyes and turning around before exiting the room. Dr. Seymour then glanced back at his latest creation and smiled proudly, even he had no idea what it would actually do. Regardless, he would soon find out. He set about tinkering with it a little more while Disciple #1 gathered up the other disciples and the tranquilizer guns with plenty of darts.
11511.title: Time to hunt for humans

choices: What has Dr. Seymour been doing all this time?
115111.content:
Steven yawned. It was starting to grow dark out, but his shift was only half over. Still, he had finished all his responsibilities, so he just stood there, waiting for his shift to end, or else waiting for some higher up to walk by and tell him to do something. He just hoped Liz would come by and maybe let him out early. If she didn't he would be left with about five hours of doing nothing.

Also, he had just bought Mass Effect 2, and was really hoping to play it. After his friends kept telling him of how great the series was, he caved and bought it. Even though the first one was a few years old, he was immediately hooked.

He sighed, could Liz hurry up?

-------

Meanwhile, just outside the store, stood a group of shadowy figures.

"Alright move, move, move." One of them said to the others.

"Mhmhmhmhmh." Replied another.

If one were to take a look at them just as they walked under a street lamp, one would see an oddly mismatched group of people, who're definitely more at home at say, a costume party, or some other similar event.

Carrying the front was the rather tall Disciple #3, who wore green camoflauge and an M1 helmet on his head. Disciple #6 followed just behind him, wearing a khevlar vest and gas mask. Just behind followed Disciple #4, a lanky man who wore a cowboy hat. The blonde haired Disciple #1 carried the back, still wearing her lab coat. All of them carried tranquilizer guns.

Of course, all these costumes were protocol for disciples of the Great Doctor Seymour.

Upon arriving near the front door, Disciple #3 turned to the other Disciples.

"Alright men!" Disciple #3 said in a loud voice. "Give em hell boys!"

Disciple #1 slapped her forehead as she watched Disciple #3 charge ahead.
-------

Meanwhile, Steven had found something to do. He had struck up conversation with Rebekah and Andrea

"How are things on your end, Andrea?"

"Oh, not bad, work is as tedious as ever." She smiled. "Only maybe twenty more years until I don't have to do this anymore."

"What?" Rebekah asked.

"Retirement." Steven said. "Isn't it way too early to talk about that?"

"Oh, I was just-" She didn't get to finish that sentence, as they all heard a crack. Andrea only had time to widen her eyes before she fell to the floor, a needle sticking out of her neck.

"Headshot." A Disciple #4 said as he crouched by an aisle across the store, gun raised.

"Wha-" Was all Steven could say before his felt a prick on his neck, and he collapsed to the ground.

"Blammo!" Disciple #3 charged to the unconscious bodies of Rebekah, Andrea and Steven.

Disciple #1 and #6 entered from other rooms, carrying other unconscious bodies.

"The whole evening shift." Disciple #1 said flatly.

"Now that is how you get it done! Now it's time to turn them in and claim our prize!"
115111.title: Raiding Wilkos

1151111.content:
With a van full of abductees, the obedient Disciples got back at the lab and transferred the unconscious store workers onto gurneys and wheeled them into the 'Arrival' area, closing the large metal shutter behind them. Dr. Seymour had his head inside one of his other machines, making some repairs, when he heard the squeak of multiple wheels. He looked up to see his assistants wheeling in the entire evening shift from Wilko, 16 unconscious 'guinea pigs' on gurneys awaiting his attention. Unfortunately for Donna, the supervisor of the Morning shift at Wilko, she'd chosen to help out at the store tonight, and as a result she was part of the 'catch'.

"Ooh wonderful my friends, absolutely... delightful." Dr. Seymour cried out, clasping his hands together before scrambling to his feet and going over to greet his returned Disciples. Each test subject was covered by a thin white sheet, with only their heads and shoulders showing. The doctor's attention settled on Elizabeth at first, since he noticed the collar of her white blouse and the lapels of her black jacket, which was one half of her skirt suit. "The one in charge I trust?" he asked Disciple #1.

"Not anymore my dear Doctor." Disciple #1 smirked in reply. "You are the only one in charge." she added.

"Precisely." Dr. Seymour murmured in satisfaction, his ego boosted as he surveyed the other unconscious forms on the gurneys. He noticed that all but four of them were female, but that didn't really bother him.

"The um... others would like their reward now if that's okay." Disciple #1 reminded the doctor.

Dr. Seymour dragged his eyes away from Liz's unconscious body and he looked at his primary assistant. "Oh yes, yes, of course. Would they like carnal entertainment? Money?" he inquired in response.

"Well, I require no reward as you know, but I believe the others would like the former." Disciple one smiled. "Seeing you perform your experiments if reward enough for me sir." she continued.

"You are too kind." Dr. Seymour responded modestly, straightening his tie. "And very well, give the rest the key to the upstairs room and tell them to enjoy themselves." he continued.

"I'm sure they'll appreciate that Doctor." Disciple #1 said truthfully.

"A little monetary reward might also be well looked upon don't you think?" Dr. Seymour added, before telling his asistant to raid his personal finances too and give some to the other Disciples. As all his assistants depart the room, Dr. Seymour turned back to his new test subjects.. and smiled again, his eyes wide with utter delight. Like a kid in a toy store.
1151111.title: Victory! Back to the lab

choices: cut to the aftermath, with the subjects waking up
11511112.content:
"Mweh heh heh heh." Dr. Seymour practically danced around the subjects. "Now then, time to get to work."

Dr. Seymour scrutinized the bodies around him. He looked from Liz, to Steven, to Donna, to Rebekah. Suddenly, he raised up a finger, as something occurred to him.

"Hmhmhm." He stepped to Rebekah and flung off the white sheet.

"Ho, ho, you all finally remembered to remove their clothes before bringing them here." Seymour said with a grin.

"Well, it is protocol..."

"No, no, You are all to be COMMENDED!" Seymour ended with a shout to the ceiling. Thankfully, all the test subjects were sedated, so even such a loud shout could not awaken them.

Doctor Seymour then began rearranging the Gurneys. Two of them went next to the dubious machine, the rest up against the wall.

Dr. Seymour then turned to Disciple #1. "Prepare the experiment." He said in a surprisingly emotionless voice for him.

Disciple #1 bowed, "With pleasure, Doctor." And she raced out of the room.

Doctor Seymour leisurely walked to the machine, and grasped the red lever in his hand. He looked up to the ceiling.

Suddenly, the room was filled with alternating blue and red lights. Almost like a particularly macabre disco party.

"Experiment ready to conduct." A vaguely feminine voice came from an intercom.

"Experiment, START!" Seymour yelled as he pulled the red lever to the floor.

The machine lit up. What was a mess of wires, tubes, and gears moved in an almost organized fashion

How about one of the protagonists finds or already has a device or gun that is capable ot turning people into wearable suits. If you like this idea, then what will the thing be called? You decide.

1152.title: Skins

11521.content:
Steven was on edge that evening as he drove himself to work. Normally it'd be just like any other day at Wilko: a few hours spent restocking items and moving things around after closing time. But today was different. Steven, who spent a great deal of time at home on the Internet, had discovered something rather strange online a week prior. It was a very shady-looking website that was riddled with occult nonsense and all sorts of what seemed to be bogus testimonials. As he was about to leave the site to check for any viruses it might have left on his computer, a recently uploaded video clip caught his eye.

"SUIT DEVICE - PROTOTYPE DEMO," it had read. Unable to hold off his temptation, he chose to give the video a whirl. It began playing what looked like hidden camera footage from a first-person view. The cameraman briefly held out what Steven assumed was some plastic ray-gun toy. He was baffled but he kept watching as the cameraman exited his room and approached a young woman in his living room.

"Hey, sis?" the man said. The girl turned around to look at him from her position on the sofa. Her eyes--as well as Steven's--went wide as the gun fired off some kind of beam. Steven gazed in shock as the girl in the video literally began to deflate. In no time, she was nothing but a pile of clothing and skin.

There was a long moment of silence as the man stood, surprised, over what used to be his sister. He himself must have been nervous about the device. But he quickly regained his composure. "It works," the cameraman said, ending the recording.

Steven hesitantly scrolled down and, underneath the video, he saw a notification: "FIRST TO PLACE ORDER RECEIVES PROTOTYPE FREE." Almost unconsciously, he gripped his mouse and ordered the gun as fast as he could. Afterwards, he turned in for the night.

The next morning, he had received an e-mail. He was the first to respond, and the device would be his within the week.

--

Steven arrived outside the store and hurried inside. The device was rather small, so he was able to hide it in his pocket with relative ease. He hadn't had the chance to test it yet, so he was still skeptical about its functionality. In his excitement, he'd left for work very early that day and he didn't see any of his other co-workers around when he arrived. A little disappointed, he made his way to the tea room to relax and think things through. His plan now was... well, he didn't really have one. The only thing he could think of was to use the device on the next person to enter the room.

It wasn't long before that happened.

"Evening, Steven!" a voice called out. Without responding, he turned around in his chair and fired the gun right at...
11521.title: Steven's New Toy.

115211.content:
Charlotte’s living body obligingly became an empty skin still dressed in her clothes, which remained standing during its metamorphosis, then crumpled to the floor, Charlotte’s hair remaining stubbornly in the bun she usually wore. At once Steven got up and first closed and locked the door to the tea room, hoping he could get inside the Charlotte skin before anyone else showed up.

Slipping Charlotte’s clothes off of the empty suit was fairly easy, although its hair fell out of its bun when he pulled off the Wilko shirt. Only when it was a bare suit, with a slit from just above its neatly-trimmed Charlotte public hair to just below its slightly stubborn but cute chin, did Steven hurriedly undress. Then he put first his right leg and then his left into the suit’s.

To Steven’s surprise, the lining of the suit was slick and its material just elastic enough that his feet popped neatly inside its feet — and his feet and legs shrank neatly so that they fitted perfectly inside! It was all painless. His by-then-erect penis and his scrotum disappeared tidily behind the feminine slit at the suit’s crotch, and his buttocks were somehow reshaped to fill the suit’s empty buttocks exactly. It was impossibly easy to thrust his arms into the suit’s delicate empty arms and find his hands, obviously shrunken, perfectly filling the Charlotte hands. With those newly delicate hands he pulled the hollow head over his, and his head was, painlessly as always, made to fit perfectly inside the full-head mask of the suit. Then the gap from below the navel to just below the chin sealed up, and a naked Charlotte stood there instead of Steven in the suit.

Charlotte was puzzled but not alarmed. What happened? I got here, I saw that someone, can’t remember who, was here in the tea room... don’t know what happened next, just I’m naked and my hair’s down... bobby-pins and scrunchie on the floor, clothes piled on the table there except my shoes... She swiftly got dressed, retrieved the scrunchie and bobby-pins, put her hair first in a high ponytail, then wound it into a tight bun she secured with the pins.

Charlotte looked at her reflection in the small mirror on the tea-room wall, and only then realized that although she was herself in body and mind, she distinctly recalled having been Steven, shooting Charlotte with a ray-gun of dubious origin, and putting on the resulting Charlotte costume and beginning to change. I should be infuriated, thought Charlotte. Always thought something was wrong with Steven, and now he’s gone and turned me into a me-suit, put it on, and become me! That evil shit! Except... for now he is me! And I love being myself and I’m not changing back into him!

Soon the new Charlotte’s mind settles a bit, and the resulting young woman, Steven’s self perfectly masked with a Charlotte persona and fitted with Charlotte’s memories, is completely content with who she is. She
115211.title: ...Charlotte.

And I’m over fifteen years younger than Steven was... really he had no right to do this to me, but I can’t imagine I’ll ever want to be Steven again. 11521121.content:
Despite the distractions of having changed gender and identity only minutes before, the new Charlotte managed to greet Liz first, as suited a subordinate. “Good evening, Liz,” she said.
