"Stacy sweetheart, you can't just go running around. It's crowded here. You have to stay close to Mommy." Marcia explained to Stacy in a sympathetic tone. Marcia was trying to looking Stacy in the eye using all the authority she could muster. Stacy was trying to avoid eye contact. Stacy knew she was wrong.

"Stacy, look at me when I am talking to you," Marcia continued in a somewhat louder tone of voice. This got Marcia's attention.

"Yes." Stacy finally said.

"Yes what???"

"Yes, I will stop running around, Mommy."

"Good, I wouldn't want to lose you." Marcia said with a smile and hugged Stacy.
115322222.title: More changes occur.

1153222221.content:
An average looking woman was talking on her phone nearby and she seemed to be getting frustrated with whoever she was talking to. As the time went by, the woman, who was about 5' 5" tall seemed to get angrier by the minute. It soon became to people who overheard her conversation that she must have been talking to her boyfriend, who was cheating on her. "Don't ever call me again you asshole, and if I see you I'll cut your balls off!" the woman spat down the phone, shocking a few passerbys, including an elderly couple.

The Role Exchanger studied the woman for a moment, and delved into the depths of her mind, probing around. She was confused, hurt and very, very angry, and the main thought going through her mind was getting through the ordeal of a messy break up. The entity came up with a solution, and exchanged the woman's emotional state with the elderly man who was walking nearby with his wife. The man was in his 80s and had served during the Korean War, he had seen things that had hardened him and now he never cried... but that was now about to change. As the couple walked past the woman, the man suddenly became tearful, remembering the friends he had lost in the war, and his few tears soon turned into a flood.

As the elderly man sobbed and was comforted by his caring wife, the spurned young woman was taking a cigarette out of her purse and lighting it up. Her tears were gone and she seemed almost 'numbed' to what had happened to her. "Suppose we can't change some things!" she muttered, shrugging her shoulders.

The Role Exchanger continued hovering nearby, observing.
1153222221.title: More changes on the line

11532222211.content:
The elderly couple kept walking with the wife (Evelyn) trying to comfort her husband (Harold).

"I'll be alright. Remember the all the years we have had together. Remember the grandkids... Remember....." she trailed off as the role exchanger worked it's magic again.

Evelyn continued, "they are having a sale at Macy's. I know what you need."

"You do???" Harold asked.hopefully.

"Yes, let's get some Baskin and Robbins ice cream. We'll split a sundae."

"But, you know that ice cream will go right to my hips."

"Then, we'll get some fat free ice cream."

"What about the sugar?" Harold said coming out of his tears.

"We'll get some fat-free, sugar-free ice cream."

"If there is no fat and no sugar is it really ice cream? Sounds to me like it is just ice." Harold said beginning to smile.

"Well lets go and see what they have, you can try it out on one of those little spoons they have."

"Yeah, let's go."

"After the ice cream, we'll go and get you a makeover. We'll pretty you up." Evelyn said happy to see Harold tears gone. "Then I know what, we can see what dresses are on sale at Macy's. We'll see they have your size after all that ice cream you will be eating."

"I have a better figure than you do." which was true, Harold was much thinner than Evelyn who was a plus sized woman even though she was in her 80s. Harold on the other hand could actually be called frail, but he didn't see himself like that anymore.

"Hey I have curves. You have no shape at all." Evelyn said and they joked their way all the way to the ice cream shop. Harold's tears were gone.

Around the corner, two teenaged girls had developed a mature love. "Let's get married," one said to the other, "I feel as though we have already been together for over fifty years"

"A only one lifetime is too short to be together with a person like you."
11532222211.title: Follow the elder. couple

115322222112.content:
Haelga, 35, was a tourist from Sweden, very attractive and also very tall, standing 6' 1" in her 3-inch heeled shoes. Her long flowing blonde hair looked silky in appearance and she was wearing a lavender-colored trouser suit and white blouse. The Role Exchanger passed over Haelga's head and moved into the corner of a nearby store, where two more tourists, from Japan, were pondering whether to buy an expensive carved lamp.

Isoruko Hamagi, 43, and his wife Himiko, 39, were a loving couple, who had been married for over 10 years. Isoruko stood just 5' 4" tall, which was average for a Japanese man, his dark, neatly-kept hair was greying at the sides and he was dressed in khaki corderoys, a blue collar shirt and brown loafers. His wife Himiko was a little over 5' 3" tall, her long black hair was secured in a pigtail, and she was wearing a shoulder-strap black dress with white polka dots and a pair of patent leather sling-back pumps. They were speaking in their own language as they discussed what purchase to make. While browsing the shelves in the Home Adornments section of the store they were in, Isoruko stood on his tip toes to reach some scented candles on a top shelf.

Haelga meanwhile was meeting up with a friend of hers, Anders, another Swedish tourist, but for a man... Anders was quite short at 5' 7". Haelga crouched slightly to kiss her friend as they met up. These two were also talking in their own language.

There was a sudden shimmer... and Isoruko shook his head for a moment before effortlessly putting the scented candles back on the shelf he had trouble reaching just moments before. He turned to his now much-shorter wife and suggested they move on. Himiko looked up at her husband and then shrugged, carefully placing the carved lamp back on the shelf before following her 5' 10" husband. Himiko stopped for a moment as she adjusted her underwear, wincing as she did so. There was now a noticeable bulge present underneath her dress.

A short distance away, Haelga was now of equal height with Anders, even with her heels on, and she remained oblivious of her significent height decrease. On the plus side it was now easier for her to kiss her companion. Anders for his part mentioned to Haelga that he had to stop off at a chemist and buy some tampons before they continued on their way. The Role Exchanger was obviously not interested in facilitating intercourse between its 'victims'.

It moved on to find its next targets, unseen by all.
115322222112.title: Role Exchanger sees someone else

11532222212.content:
Liara was walking around the mall. This was her last day in America and she wanted to get some shopping done before she returned home to Britain. They had the same shit in the US as they did back home but with the exchange rate it seemed a lot cheaper, besides any excuse for shopping was a good excuse. Liara didn't want to go home. This was her first vacation in god knows how long. She couldn't get away she had to take care of her elderly mother. But somehow Liara's friends got the money together and arranged for Liara's mother to be taken care of while she was away.

Tomorrow she would be back on the plane heading home. Then she would have the daily grind of paying her bills and taking care of her mother. It had been this way for such a long time, she was getting sick herself. That is why her friends got together to send her away. They could see she couldn't stand for it much longer before she broke down and then not only Liara but her mother would suffer too and that would put a strain on everyone else.

Passing by Liara was Michael. He was carrying many bags for his wife Wilma. Michael was totally whipped by her. The many years of marriage had worn him down. He found it was just easier to give into Wilma's demands. He worked of course, but he also cleaned the house and did whatever she asked. It hadn't always been like this, he had loved her in the beginning even though she was demanding. He started out thinking he was just helping Wilma out. But the more he did the more she wanted him to do. Soon, he was doing anything she said. She didn't consider his needs or his feelings it was all what Wilma wanted. He couldn't leave her, she wouldn't let him. Even the few things that Michael needed were chosen by Wilma. He would have preferred another type of shirt or pants that were more comfortable but she wouldn't hear of it. His job was to pay for the purchases and carry the bags and that was it.

Michael noticed a blue flash out of the corner of his eye. Michael sighed to himself, this was the last day of his vacation. He had to return home tomorrow and then it was back to work, back to taking care of his sick mother's needs, back to cleaning both his house and his mothers. Day after day, week after week, there was no end. He could count the hours of freedom from all the responsibility he had.

Liara trailed behind her wife. She didn't want to wear heels they hurt her feet. She didn't want to wear a corset, it made it uncomfortable to breath. She didn't want to carry all the bags. But Wilma her wife insisted and you didn't go against Wilma. She wished she could wear flats like Wilma but she couldn't. She wished she could wear some slacks or at least a skirt that was wide enough that she didn't have to take so many small mincing steps but she couldn't Wilma told her what to do and there was nothing she could do about it.
11532222212.title: Two people trapped

115322222122.content:
Because of the size of the mall the Role Swapper was having a hard time deciding on experiments. It would be nice if there was a chance to actually study a role swap, or gender change instead of zipping around causing unknown havoc. Just as this thought entered the Role swappers consciousness,the perfect opportunity presented itself front and center.

A family of four were traipsing through the mall rather loudly. The father was a man of modest height who was in his mid-30's. He stood about 5'8" and was wearing am NFL team shirt and blue jeans. He had a baseball cap on and had the brim turned backwards. Jack was still trying to be hip,but with two children those days were long gone.

His wife was particularly attractive and carried her age well. She did aerobics and weight training 3 times a week at her local YMCA. When people looked at the two they could not figure out why Linda was with Jack. Linda's mother could not figure it out and this lead to many fights between mother and daughter.Especially, since Jack was cheating on her with his secretary. Maybe it was because Jack owned his own company and was worth over 7 digits. Linda was wearing a very expensive silk red blouse with some designer jeans tucked into a pair of black knee high heeled boots

The children were ages 8 and 11. Little Jack jr. was a spoiled little brat who easily manipulated his mother. When he wanted something he would throw a tantrum,much like he was doing now. The 11 year old daughter was the apple of Jack's eye. She had it(whatever it was) before the words were out of her mouth. Her mother was growing quite displeased with her attitude. Corrine was wearing a white dress and a beautiful black sweater over it. Jack jr. was in jeans and a red t-shirt that had a super hero of some sort on it.

So the scene is set: Jack jr. is in the midst of a tantrum over being pulled out of the lego store and not being able to convince his mother that he should own the 200 dollar plus death star. People were starring at the mother and son, because firsts of all Linda's voice was becoming higher and Jack jr. was screaming at the top of his lungs.

Jack sr. was busy pretending not to see his wife struggling with his son as he went and sat next to his daughter on one of the mall benches. Meanwhile,things were getting a bit out of control as Jack jr. had proceeded to get Linda to fall on the ground. At this point all of the mall traffic stopped and people gasped. Linda saw the traditional blue flash and then stood up and said,"That is it young man you are so grounded." The only weird thing was that she said it withJack Jr's voice.
Jack jr. responded by saying, "AAaarrrgghh!" which was pretty funny since it was Linda's own voice.

Linda then collected her things and put them back into her purse and clicked over to Jack sr. and said,"Gee Jack thanks for all of your help back there." She still sounded like her son but did not realize it. The husband did not respond but Corrine spoke up. " Daddy I saw a Justus store back there do you think..." Before she finished her father responded.
"Of course princess we can...." Their voices each changed pitch. Jack's became higher pitched while Corrine's became lower as the father and daughter's voices switched.

Then the Role swapper got an even more devious idea. What if their voices were not the only thing that gets swapped. What would happen if mother and son would say what traditionally the other one would say. What would be weird is that after saying it they would realize that is not what they meant to say, but try as they might they could not correct it. The father and daughter would then have the same thing happen to them. Jack sr. saw a strange blue light and it quickly vanished.

Then Jack looked at his daughter and uncontrollably said," Daddy when we get to Justus there are the cutest earrings I want to try on." in his daughter's voice. Jack did not care that he sounded like an 11 year old girl what concerned him was that he just asked to try on earrings. He tried to gain control but what he said next disturbed him more. "Then we could go try on shoes too, please daddy." In Jack's mind he was thinking what the fuck, but he could not get that out. This caused Corrine to respond by saying," Princess one thing at a time ok." Corrine got a weird look on her face as she tried to correct herself. She wanted to say,"hey dad why am I calling you princess?" But what came out was," Sweetie goes easy on daddy's wallet."

Meanwhile, Jack jr. was heading over to the family and words began to leave his lips before he could realize they were coming out. He walked over to Linda who was fixing the contents of her purse. "Young man when we get home you are not to watch any television and you cannot play your wii the rest of the night." Jack.jr's eyes widened in horror at what just came out of his mouth. He said all of this with his mother's stern inflection and her voice. Then Linda looked up and whined,"Mom, that is so unfair." Then Linda started to cry extremely loudly and it was all done with a little boy's voice.

Jack Jr. then turned to his dad and said," Jack you handle your son while I will take Corrine shopping for her earrings"
Then he just sat down. Then he sat down and all four family members were silent. Afraid of what would come out of their mouths next.
115322222122.title: The R.E. sees someone else

choices: Find Linda and leave the mall
1153222221221.content:
Jack started crying himself, "Mommy, something is wrong." he told Linda in Corrine's voice.

"Get off of me," was Linda's reply who was still sobbing.

"Hush, it'll be alright." Jack Jr/ said in a soothing tone to his crying father while putting a arm around him.

"We have to get out of here," Corrine said in the strong commanding tone of her father.

While still comforting Jack, Junior said in his mother's voice, "Maybe we should see security and find out what is happening?"

"You mean him," Corrine said referring to an adult man who was lying on the floor in a pool of his own urine. The man who was dressed in a security guard uniform had removed both of his shoes and was playing with his sock encased toes. No one noticed the woman who was pushing a stroller with a baby who was trying to click the safety lock on his stroller harness. The baby didn't have the dexterity to do it. When the baby said something, a pacifier was placed into his mouth, shutting him up. "I don't think that security can help us." Corrine continued.

"But what if we leave and don't get back to normal." Junior said.

It was at this moment that Linda found herself returning towards the toy store. She didn't want to buy the $200 toy but she felt she had no control.

"Well then, I guess we can come back. I don't know, I am making this up as I go along." Corrine said. Jack had stopped crying. He wanted to say that Corrine was right. They should leave but he couldn't say anything, he was just happy he wasn't crying anymore.

"OK, we'll go then," Junior said, then he looked around. "Hey where is???" Junior trailed off, not seeing Linda.
1153222221221.title: continue

11532222212212.content:
Jr took his arm away from his father and stood up to his full 4' height and craned his head in search of his mother. He was really very scared and wanted his mother there to help calm his nerves. Senior Jack could be heard sniffling as he tried to stifle the girlish sobs coming from his throat. Corrine then slid down the bench and put her hand under Jack's chin and said,"Sweetie lets go to Justus. I bet those earrings will help cheer you up." in her father's masculine voice.
Jack tried to keep his lips pursed tightly together but his daughter's voice bursts out. "ok daddy."

Just then Jr turned around and uncontrollably said," Oh no you don't. You two need to help me find Jack jr., then we are going straight home." Jr just shrugged is shoulder and shook his head not believing the words leaving his mouth. Then Corrine stood up and said," Ok honey, I think I know where that boy is." Then a funny thing happened, nobody moved they were too afraid to do anything. Even though they had each others voices they thought that was normal. What scared them was the words they were saying. Jr was thinking to himself. Why do I keep saying things mommie always does?

Then the 11 year old got an idea. She dug through her little trainer purse. She could remember Jr teasing her about her carrying the purse and that she really had nothing it. But this time she thought she might have something that might save the day. She found a pen and pad in her purse.As she pulled them out and began to write Jr. spoke up while looking at Jack."Well Jack where is that son of yours?"

Corrine stopped writing and looked at Jr and said," I will bet anything he went back to the toy store." This time the Role Swapper enticed them to start walking to the toy store. Jr looked at his father and said,"If he is back in that store he will be grounded for a month." All Jack could say was," Come on Mom even jr. isn't that stubborn." Corrine then slid the paper into her father's hand while these words came out of her." I hope for his sake that he did not go back there. I don't think I ever seen your mother this mad."

The group saw Linda standing outside of the toy store with a confused look on her face. Jr walked up to her and said in her voice,"Young man you better have a good explanation as to why you are back over here." Linda's face contorted as she struggled to hold back the words that were forcing their way out of her mouth. Her face turned red and it was if she were gasping for air when she said in her son's voice,"MoM PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE, can I have the lego toy.

Corrine involuntarily said,"Now Jr. that is enough, we are going to go home before your mother grounds you for a year." Then the mismatched voiced family proceeded to head toward the exit. Jr walked over to his father and said,"Thank you for backing me up,Jack." All Jack could do was utter,"Gee I guess I won't be getting those earrings.' Linda was walking normally except she kept muttering things like, "shoot" and "I can't ever do nothing." It was like watching someone battle with a bad case of the hiccups

Meanwhile, Jack looked down at the slip of paper his daughter handed him. It read: I don't feel compelled to say your words when I am writing so maybe we can communicate this way. When we get home go find some paper and pencils Don't worryI I promise everything will be okay princess. Jack smiled as he slid the paper into his pocket and fished the car keys out of his pocket.

He opened his door and and got into the drivers seat while Linda got in on the passenger side. The kids piled into the back seats. Corrine started saying,"Okay everybody put your seat belts on the next stop is home." Then Jr said without even moving."Kids you heard your father make sure you are buckled in." and the response from the front seat was "Aw mom." Then Jack started the car and they headed home.
11532222212212.title: Find Linda and leave the mall

choices: Linda and Corrine talk it over
115322222122121.content:
Jack decided it was best to not say anything on the way home. No one had said anything since they got into the car and that was just fine with him. He decided to put on some music. The family had over time had an unspoken agreement upon a radio station and he put it on.

When they got home, Jr and Corrine went to their rooms and so did Jack and Linda.

Jack closed the door and asked, "Where did you go?" He could ask this question because it was the same question that both he and Corrine wanted to know. For a moment he thought everything had returned to normal.

"I went to the toy store to get my legos," Linda replied in an obnoxious and sarcastic tone that all boys under thirteen used. Although some women thought that boys of all ages never lost this tone.

"You went to get legos???" Jack inquired incredulously. Another statement that both Jack and Corrine would have said, but the next thing that came out of his mouth only Corrine would say. "You always get the stupidest stuff."

"I want the fun stuff like toys and candy. I don't waste my time on dumb things like clothes and shoes," Linda retorted.

"I like looking pretty," Jack said. On his face was a pout he had seen on Corrine hundreds of times.

"You can never look pretty, you are a stupidhead and stupidheads are never pretty." Linda's voice rose. She didn't mean any of what she was saying, but once the argument started she was carried along like a newspaper being blown in the wind.

Jack could feel tears well up in his eyes. "I am not a stupid head. I'm a pretty young lady,"

"STUPIDHEAD, STUPIDHEAD, CORRINE IS A STUPIDHEAD." Linda taunted.

"YOU TAAAKE THAAAT BACCCK!" Now Jack's tears had broken the surface. Both Jack and Linda didn't want to argue. Certainly not about this, but neither could help themselves. "I'MMMMM A A A VERY PRETTTTY YOUNG LAADDY!!!"

The fight continued for several minutes. It was the age old fight that younger siblings of differing genders have had for as long as there were people. Neither wanted to have this argument but neither could get out of it. They didn't even think to leave the room.

It was at this point that Corrine came into the room. She could hear the argument from her room where she was playing with a doll. She became concerned and entered her parent's bedroom. "SHUT UP YOU TWO. STOP THIS ARGUING OR I WILL PUT BOTH OF YOU ON MY LAP AND YOU WON'T SIT FOR A WEEK." Corrine said in her dad's loud strong baritone voice. She had no intention of doing that. She couldn't if she wanted to, she just opened her mouth and the words came out. This ended the argument between Jack and Linda. Both were shocked into silence, although Jack's sobbing didn't dissipate as quickly. Once both Jack and Linda were quiet, Corrine went on to scold each of them as her daddy had many times before when he had caught them yelling at each other.

Jack finally controlled his tears. He didn't really feel mad or sad, he felt frustrated. He didn't know what to do, but arguing with Linda about toys and being called names wasn't going to do any good. "I'm going to the living room to be alone." Once again he could say this since he meant it and it was something that Corrine would do also. He then left the room.
115322222122121.title: More?

choices: Neighbors visit RS makes them treat the family accordingly
1153222221221212.content:
The Role Swapper was busy taking notes. The mischievous entity was engrossed with how easily these creatures became upset over the slightest adjustment to their perceptions of reality. This particular group of specimens would be entered into a case file which would be documented for future review at the Human Trait Academy back on the Role Swappers home planet. The Role Swapper or more accurately X-9Lq as it was known back on its planet was pleased with this experiment.

Back in Corrine's parents bedroom Corrine found herself talking to her mother but with the consoling way her father did when Jr. got in trouble. "Look sport, Corrine is a girl and they see things differently than you and I do." Corrine spoke these words but was not even facing Linda she was trying to find the legal tablet that was usually on her father's night stand.

Linda sat on the edge of her bed and crossed her legs. She was turning red trying to hold back the urge to speak. Finally like a bubble of air these words pushed out of her mouth." I know daddy,but she told me that legos are dumb, and she is always trying to tell me what to do. I hate her." Corrine was writing something down as she noticed her mother putting her hands over her mouth trying to stop the rush of words and emotion coming from her.

Corrine then walked over walked over and put the legal sized paper on her mother's lap. "Ok,, I will talk to your sister too, but for now you stay in your room. Mom is pretty mad at you too and you don't need another female on your case." Linda was pretty surprised by this comment. She thought to herself, is this how Jack talks to the kids? No wonder they behave the way they do. While she was distracted by her own thoughts, this slipped out. " Girls are stupid." Then she looked down at the paper Corrine wrote. Then Corrine walked out of the bedroom

Meanwhile, the telephone in Linda's purse starting going off. Linda could hear it and got up to start walking over to it. When she got to the bedroom's door she found that she could not cross the threshold of the doorway. Linda would always hang her purse up in the front foray. Then the ringing stopped and she could her her son talking into the phone.
Even though he spoke with his mother's voice,Linda though that it was Jr who was talking since she believed that his voice was hers.

"Oh hi mom", Jr said as he held the pink IPhone to his ear. Before the phone rang he was in his room playing his wii which he was supposed to be punished from, but instead Linda found that she was punished from it. Jr felt like he was being pulled into the foray toward his mother's huge black coach purse. Then his hands expertly dug through the purse and found his mom's phone and answered it. It was his grandmother, but he found himself calling her mom.

"No Mom Jack is not at work. "Yes he is home with me and the children." Linda listened by the bedroom door she knew this conversation really well. Her mother hated Jack and was always accusing him of having an affair but what was
making her nervous was her 8 year old son was doing all the talking. It was then that she noticed the paper that feel off of her lap that her daughter had placed there when she was in the room. It read: Hey Champ we can communicate in writing. I do not have any of dads words come out when I write so find paper and we can write notes to each other thats when Linda noticed Corrine signed the paper "Jack". Well at least its a start Linda thought as she searched her bedroom for a pen.

Jr was finishing his conversation with his grandmother who thought she was talking to her daughter."Ok mom I will give the kids your love,ok... yeah, love you too, goodbye." Jr pressed the disconnect button and put his mom's phone back in her purse in the side pocket, which is where he fund it. "That woman" Jr breathed exhaustively which is what his mom said every time she hung up with his grandmother. Then he walked into the living room and saw his dad sitting on the couch. "Jack what do you and the kids want me to fix for dinner?" Jack struggled not to say anything but, "Why don't you make tacos tonight mom?" Then Jr sat on the couch as he and his dad tried to think of what to do next.
1153222221221212.title: Linda and Corrine talk it over

choices: Corrine fold like a house of cards
Corrine agrees with Jr, Joyce can't come over.
11532222212212122.content:
Jr went off to the kitchen, presumably to make tacos. Jack found himself alone on the couch in the living room. He found that if he didn't have the distraction of talking he could think for himself. He started out thinking what had happened but he had no answer. He knew that his entire family was effected. But he realized that his thoughts were still his own. He didn't have to be anywhere today he could stay here and try and figure something out. "But what if nothing changed by the time he had to go to work?" he thought. He supposed he could just do his job without talking to anyone. But what if someone tried to talk to him, then what would happen? He would be forced to talk, just like the 'argument' he had just had had with Linda. What would he say that he wanted his dolly? That he wanted to go home. Then he realized who said he would go to work, he might go to school instead. He imagined himself in the fifth grade. What would happen then. He supposed he could do the work but....Hey wait, if he showed up in the fifth grade men in white coats would come and take him away. Maybe it wouldn't be men in white coats it might be the police. He would be taken to jail and be labeled a pediphile. His mind started to race in every direction. Each scenario worse than the last.

The phone started ringing. Breaking, Jack's train of thought. Corrine went to get it. "Hello," she said in her dad's manly tone.

"Hi, Mr. Kelly, is Corrine there." It was Corrine's friend Joyce. Corrine wanted to say "It's me." But instead she said. "Yes, hold on, I"ll put her on." The she put down the phone extension went into the living room and told Jack. "Corrine, Joyce is on the line."

Jack was compelled to pick up the phone and say "Hiya, Joyce."

Meanwhile, Jr didn't know how to make tacos. He had helped his mom by grating cheese and lettuce. But he didn't know how to cook the meat. At eight, he wasn't allowed to even turn on the stove. But he got an idea he could do, "Jr," he called towards his parent's room. "get down here right now." Linda came as beckoned. She wasn't compelled to go, she wanted to. "Jr. I want you to help me make tacos." Jr said in his mom's firm no nonsense voice.

"Aww mom, I want to play." Linda said although she thought that making Tacos was a good idea. But just agreeing isn't something that Jr would do.

"Young man, you are already in enough trouble. Don't give me any backtalk."

Linda wanted to agree, but she couldn't not this easily anyway. "You never let me have any fun."

"You are already grounded, do you want to stay grounded for a week."

"Oh, alright," Linda said with her eyes staring at the floor.

Linda then went to the refrigerator and got the ground beef and then to the cabinet to get the other spices she would need. Jr wanted to leave the kitchen and get back to playing, but Linda gave him a wordless look and he knew he had to help. Jr started to prepare the lettuce and cheese.

"Mommy, Mommy," Jack said excitedly to Jr as he ran into the kitchen. "Joyce is on the phone she wants to come over and spend the night. Can she, please, please." Jack certainly didn't want Joyce or anyone else over but that isn't what Corrine would say.

"I don't think so" which is what both Jack, Linda and Jr would say in this situation.

"But Mommy, Joyce's parents are going out for the night and she wants to stay here instead of being with a stupid babysitter."

"The answer is NO!"

Jack protested a little more, but he knew that he couldn't get his way. Relieved Jack left the kitchen to tell Joyce who was still on the phone. Then he saw Corrine. Jack screwed up his face into a pouty puppy dog look and then with all the feeling he could muster he asked Corrine in his cutsiest little girl voice, "Daddy, can Joyce come over and stay the night? Please, Please, Please."
11532222212212122.title: something else

choices: who can sleep with whats going on
115322222122121221.content:
Corrine's eyes grew wide as she realized two things as her father continued begging for a sleep over. One, the look that her father was using on her was the "look". It was used by Corrine when her mother told her no. She would then go over her mother;s head and guilt her father into getting her way. This would drive her mother crazy. The second thing she thought was that this "look" was such an effective tactic that it never failed. So that left her knowing she was going to cave and that would more then likely her friend Joyce would be sleeping over. This would create a seismic rift in her social status at school.

While these thoughts were spinning through her mind she heard herself saying," Pumpkin what did mom say?" Her father answered," She said it was up to you." Even Corrine knew this was a lie because she used this line so much herself. "Well, princess the family seems to be having some problems so tonight might not be a good idea okay?" Great Corrine thought at least that seems like a rationale decision. Thats when Jack went from pleasant o "full on" whining.
'But daddy I didn't get my earrings and those cute new shoes and I was fine with that but you said".... This went on for a full five minutes before Corrine finally found herself saying."Okay okay she can sleep over."

"Yay" Jack said. But inside he was was actually scared to death as he went back to the phone and informed Joyce she could sleep over. Our good friend the role swapper decided at this point an unconditioned response variable should be added into the dimension of this experiment. As everyone knows a conditioned response is one in which we naturally do. For example, when we hear a loud noise and jump in fear,unconditioned responses are ones that are learned, like Pavlov's dog. So in this scenario the Role Swapper decided that when ever someone outside of the family comes into contact with them, they will automatically respond to that family member as if they were that person.This will apply to all members of the family

So now when Joyce comes over for her sleep over she will look at Frank and think he is Corrine. The Role Swapper smiled at how devious it could be when it put its mind to work. The ironic part of this experiment will be that Frank will still be a grown man,but will be treated as if he was an 11 year old girl. Plus there will be the added excitement of his inability to say anything to the contrary.

Jr. was walking out of the kitchen when he heard Frank saying that Joyce could come sleep over. He waited until he hung up the phone and then he said. "Frank why did you let Corrine invite that Joyce over hear?" I explicitly told her that she could not invite any one over. Why do you constantly give in to your daughter, blah, blah blah" Jr continued to berate his father much like his mother did when she got overruled. But Frank did not say a word but just had a smug smile on his face. Then Corrine walked in and said,"Linda, I don't see anything wrong with Corrine having a sleepover, after all she was fine with not getting her earrings or shoes." Jr then went into a tirade that had words in it that should not be printed in a family story. The parental argument ended with Jr saying he was going up to his mom's bedroom and that Corrine and Frank could eat dinner alone, but instead he just went to his room to play Wii.

All Corrine could do was put her hand to her forehead and wonder what she was going to do when Joyce showed up.
115322222122121221.title: Corrine fold like a house of cards

1153222221221212211.content:
(The events had really bothered Jack so much that he thought his name was Frank for a moment...but he's sure he won't do that again

The tacos were ready. Everyone had to make their own. Linda, placed all the taco ingredients (the taco shells, cooked beef with her secret ingredient, shredded lettuce, shredded cheese, sour cream, guacamole, and other things) on the table. Each member of the family took a shell and then put what they wanted into it. This was how taco night went with Jack's family.

Linda, Jack and Corrine were gathered around the table and made their tacos. Nothing was said. Everyone at the table was worried. Jack and Linda didn't know what would happen if an outsider saw them acting like this. Corrine wasn't worried about that she was worried about what would be said at school. Jack had the worst thoughts. Linda and Corrine were worried about being embarrassed. Jack worried about being labeled a pedophile and being arrested. As long as no one said anything everything seemed perfectly normal. But this couldn't go on, not with Joyce coming over. The minutes ticked by.

Jack decided to risk speaking, he was going to say how worried he was about Joyce coming over. He had said what he wanted to for s few second before maybe he could get away with it again.

What Jack said instead was, "When is Joyce getting here!?! We are going to have so much fun." With the damn broken, everyone fell into verbal character.

"She'll be here when she gets here, Pumpkin."

"I can't wait!!!"

"All girl's have cooties," Linda said. "I don't want any stinky girl to come over." Then Linda continued, "If Corrine gets a sleepover, can Bobby sleep over with me?"

"ABSOLUTELY NOT!" Corrine said which was a sentiment that was shared but everyone at the table.

"Your not being fair."

"Don't forget you are being grounded, Jr."

"I never have any fun."

Once the conversation was started there was no ending it. Neither wanted to argue, but they fell into patterns. Back and forth Linda and Corrine went. Jack was happy he was left out of the conversation. Finally, talk of a spanking had creeped into the conversation and then ended it. Linda knew there was no arguing once spanking was brought up. For a moment Linda wondered with the way she was acting she could get spanked.

Suddenly the doorbell rang. "JOYCE IS HERE!!!" Jack said happily although he didn't feel happy at all. "I'll get it." Normally Corrine would run to get the door, but she was just as frightened as anyone else. Jack knew that the door had to be opened. He couldn't just let her wait at the door. So reluctantly he walked to the door. Jack opened the door and upon seeing Joyce gushed "COME IN, COME IN." Joyce saw what she thought was her friend and hugged Jack. Jack played along and hugged back. Thoughts of being labeled a pedophile danced in his head again.
1153222221221212211.title: who can sleep with whats going on

11533.content:
From Jonathon's perspective:

Jonathon's wife, Mabel had asked him to pick her up at the mall at 3:30. Jonathon was on time and he took his dog Max. Jonathon decided to get out of the car and take a smoke and wait for his wife. Max came with him, but they didn't allow dogs inside the mall so they waited at the front entrance for Jonathon's wife.

"Mabel I tell you I don't know what got into Max. I was just standing here waiting for you. Max was just standing with me as usual. Then something must have spooked him. He started pulling on the leash. I had to use all my strength to hold him back. I kept saying 'Max Stop' but he kept pulling. Out of desperation I shouted ''Max you stop right now or I'll take you to obedience training, right after I have you neutered.' He quieted down after that. But he has been pacing back and forth like this ever since.'

From Kevin's perspective:

I was walking out of the mall when all of a sudden I saw a blue flash. Then I couldn't see right, everything turned black and white like I became color blind. I looked up and I was sort of on the floor, but in front of me I saw man that looked like me. That man started to run, so I wanted to follow. But something around my neck was holding me back. I pulled and pulled but I couldn't go to follow that man who looked like me. He ran around a corner and I couldn't see him anymore. Finally I gave up. I looked back and someone was holding a leash that was attached to me. He looked awfully big. I kept pacing back and forth I don't know what to do.
11533.title: Man and his dog

115333.content:
Luke entered work one Wednesday evening, looking overly excited about something. Liz noticed but said nothing as he passed her and smiled, and Aaron questioned him why he was so happy, since he was at work after all. Luke just shrugged, smiled again and then made his way upstairs. Once in the privacy of the gents toilets, he took his new 'toy' out of his coat pocket. A device about the same size of a flip-up phone, and it vaguely resembled one of the hand phasers from Star Trek: The Next Generation. In small bold lettering at the base of the device it said 'Trait Swapper X01'.

"Lets give you a try out shall we?" Luke chuckled to himself, kissing his toy, before putting it on the nearby window ledge until he'd taken his coat off and put it in his locker. That done, Luke made his way downstairs with his co-workers when it was time to start work.

As usual there was the 'huddle' at the Help Desk, where Liz informed everyone what needed to be done for the night and how the store was doing in general. As per usual, Luke took no notice what was being said. Instead he studied his friends and co-workers, trying to decide who he should try his device on first.

Luke knew he could swap any two people's body parts, personalities, clothing, etc. And he could either make them aware or unaware with a simple thought. The device was somehow capable ot reading his thoughts. All he had to do was think what he wanted to swap... and then zap his two targets. A broad smile appeared on his face that he tried to hide, at least until the huddle was over five minutes later. When it was, Luke casually approached his assigned work section (the pet food section) and set up his rubbish bags. But that was as far as he got doing his job, for he whipped the device from his trouser pocket and headed towards the Goods In area, where Liz was signing the paperwork for the delivery truck driver so he could head back to the depot. Steven was also nearby, helping Natalie fix a broken shelf on the toiletries aisle. Luke also knew his other co-workers were not far away, starting their own assigned tasks, and he could target whoever he liked.

But he decided to start with...
115333.title: Luke's device.

info.brief_description: More fun with the store employees and their friends.
info.description:
This is not a follow-on story from Acquiring Powers, it will have new beginnings and slightly fewer characters. The individual authors will be able to choose which powers Elizabeth or any of her employees get, and what they do with them. It will not only be set within the confines of the store in which the Wilko employees work, other locations can be introduced.

The employees can work during the day when customers are in the building or after closing hours. They can also meet out of work hours at pubs, social events and the like. Another setting for the story will be the beauty salon that one of the protagonists runs with two of her own friends. Any other locations are of course welcome.

I hope people will like to add to this story as a lot did the last one, I would appreciate it more than you know.

You are all restricted only by the limits of your imagination.

The story can contain body/trait swapping, head swapping, possession, transformation, muscle growth and anything else you can think of.

Rules: There are no rules... have fun!!

The protagonists:

Elizabeth, 28, the acting manager of the store. She has short blonde hair and is of petite build, standing about 5'5" without her heels on. At work always wears a trouser suit (sometimes a skirt suit), and high heels, her large B-Cup breasts are a "nice handful".

Liz, 31, is the supervisor of the evening team and another main protagonist. She is only 5'4" tall... but she makes her presence known. Her blondish-brown hair is long, past her shoulders and she wears it in a ponytail. She has size 30H-cup breasts and also has a size 7 (EU 40, US 9.5) shoe. She is a bit of a tomboy regarding clothes, never seen wearing a skirt, even out of work hours. While at work she wears a red, company polo shirt, black, boot-cut trousers, black socks and a pair of flat, black leather, lace-up shoes or sneaker flats.

Steven, 33 years old, he is 6'0" tall, he wears glasses and is 'average' looking. He isn't one for going out and enjoying himself with others, preferring to stay indoors. He nonetheless likes and gets along with his co-workers and friends.

Andrea, 52, a good friend of Liz's and Steven's and a very pleasant woman/work colleague. She also has short blonde hair, is a 'full-figured' woman, and her breasts of course match her body size. She stands about 5'5" tall.

Natalie, 27, another of the female employees, an attractive girl with shoulder-length, straight brown hair with blonde highlights, she stands 5'6" tall and is very slender, has a modest backside and breasts that are almost into a C-Cup...but not quite. Not overly curvy, she is still very pleasing to the eye. She has recently got engaged to her fiance.

Rebekah, 18, one of the youngest staff members, very cute girl, about 5'5" tall, long blonde hair, B-Cup breasts, has a gap between her front teeth that makes her look even cuter. Very warm personality.

Aaron, 26, he is about 5'10" tall, quite fit physically and always wears a baseball cap while working. He is the second youngest male employee in the store and is also a heavy smoker. He finds it hard not to include foul language in normal conversation. Known for his temper, he sometimes refrains from speaking to anyone if he is in a bad mood, much like Steven.

Helen, 42, standing about 5'7" tall, she is a very pleasant and likeable woman, with shoulder length, wavy black hair. She is very quiet and has a very girlish giggle when laughing, she is also a smoker, and she's married, like a lot of her colleagues. She has D-Cup breasts and is not what people would call 'slender', but neither is she a large woman.

Becca, 23, one of the youngest workers in the store, standing about 5'5", she LOVES to talk to anyone about anything, she has perky, B-Cup breasts and has a large ass, which some boys actually found sexy. She is always changing her hair color, but it was currently a blood-red color, slightly gothic in appearance, but not a lot. She is an easy person to talk to, but sometimes she doesn't know when to stop.

Tracey, 35, ("Waggy") a bubbly blonde woman, about 5'5" tall, always in a good mood and knows how to have a laugh, bit of a party girl. She's the mother of two small children, she has a slender build and sizeable 36B breasts. At work she has on a pair of black trousers and black, slip-on shoes as well as her red Wilko top.

Nicola, 42, the shortest employee (about 5'0" high) and mother of seven children (also pregnant with her eighth), she is very out-going and polite, wears her dyed blonde hair up in a bun most of the time, but occasionally she lets it down. Clothing style (at work) is usually a compulsory red company polo shirt, black pants/trousers and a pair of comfortable black flats. Nicola has 36C breasts.

Luke, 20, a tall individual at 6'2" in height, has a short, crew cut hairstyle and is quite handsome. Not been working at the store for long, is popular and easy going, always one to have a laugh with his friends. He wears a red, button up, company shirt, black pants and smart, dress shoes.

Laura, 17, another 'newbie', a shy, quiet girl (except when she's with her boyfriend out of work). Standing about 5'5" tall, she also wears her dusty blonde hair in a pigtail at work, and wears the trademark company polo shirt, black, boot-cut trousers, black tights underneath and a pair of sensible black flats with a single strap across the top of each foot. This delightful individual has perky B-Cup breasts.

Mona, 18, a pretty Iranian-born Muslim girl, about 5'4" in height, black hair (she does not wear a headscarf, unlike her mother), she wears contacts, has pert breasts and as well as the usual company top, she wears trousers and either a pair of ballet flats or dark hi-top sneakers. She also has braces on her teeth like Becky. Wears a necklace and a bracelet, both with an Islamic symbol hanging from them.

Charlotte, an 18-year old girl, very loud and 'rude' sometimes, she isn't one for keeping her opinion to herself regardless how offensive it might be deemed to others. She is the tallest girl at 5'9" tall, wears her dark hair in a bun most time, and occasionally in a ponytail or down, she also has B-Cup breasts, though they are slightly smaller than Mona's.

Donna, 43 years old. The supervisor of the Morning Team, About 5'5" tall, mother of two, she has black, cropped hair and C-cup breasts. Wears a white blouse, black slacks, tights and black patent high heels.

Carly, 31, Andrea's daughter, she has short, stylish blonde hair, and she is married to Simon, 33. She isn't a worker at the store but often drops by to see her mother. Very attractive, even cute, she stands 5'2" tall and has impressive C-Cup breasts to go with her curvy figure. She's very careful to keep her body in shape and is a very polite, outgoing girl who likes to party. She is a self-employed beautician and she knows Steven personally, even his secrets, as do Andrea and Liz.

Zoe, 30, Carly's best friend who works with her at her beauty salon, quite tall for a woman, large breasts, and she has long, dark brown hair that she normally wears up in a ponytail. She wears designer glasses and is very attractive and out-going, loves her 'girly' clothes...much like Carly does.

Kay, 29, another of Carly's friends who works at her salon. She is a woman of short stature, standing roughly 5'1" tall, her shoulder-length light brown hair, average looks and breasts into a small C-cup. She has a 'full figure' and a pleasant personality.
